title: 关于X 2 Earn应用的思考
body:
最近众多X 2 Earn应用在龙头STEPN爆火之后陆续产生，想在这里做一个小的总结和反思。

## X to earn形式分析

最最早期的当然还是Axie的玩游戏赚钱的老玩法，在经历了半年时间的众多游戏逐渐崩溃，或许我们可以得到一些反思。纯粹的玩游戏，并不能给玩家提供什么正向的外部性，再加上Web3游戏大多做的远不如Web2游戏的可玩性，最后就纯粹只是为了赚钱而来。

**个人认为好的x2e项目的x应该是一个正向性的x，是一个玩家坚持下去比较困难，有懒惰方面的阻力，但是玩家又希望坚持下去的好习惯**。比如我们在买健身卡之前期望的以后每天都去锻炼，报了英语课程之后期望的每天认真学习，买了书/Kindle以后坚持每天阅读等。那么对应在web3项目，或许就变成了每天跑步/运动/学英语/读书赚钱。从这个角度理解，这也是我个人不太认同一些其他的比如吃饭/玩游戏/唱歌/sex赚钱的理由，可能没有这个付费监督自己每天做这些事情的动机。所以或许不是所有事情，都是适合to earn的。

**由STEPN开启了move 2 Earn的新篇章**，还有很多从最开始的基本纯抄袭的跑步仿盘，到一些有的独特对战和探险属性的Move 2 Earn应用。其大多是靠陀螺仪+GPS的方式来捕捉运动，并有像STEPN类型的各种防作弊机制。实际陀螺仪+GPS的组合如果很好的加上服务器的数据分析，相对数据维度较少，可以比较容易识别作弊行为。但是个人认为其可拓展的形式会有点欠缺，主要通过分享经历，分享路线等方式，但是或许很少有听说有跑步直播的。

当然也有一些**泛运动类型赚钱的应用**陆续产生，由于泛运动属性支持的运动类型较为广泛，比如可以类似Keep支持各种动作姿势的室内运动，相对适用性也许会比跑步类应用更广泛。由于是室内运动，为了防作弊，其主要通过移动端的摄像头，对人体动作进行捕捉，并进行部分数学抽象来提取人体的运动。但是目前我体验过的一些应用，实际的算法可能还不够成熟，经常动作后没有捕捉到，体验不太好。不过理论上，这种技术不至于像自动驾驶一样难做，或许值得期待。目前因为还没有做的很大的这类型应用，不知道未来对于重放作弊是否能够有效检测预防。

对于**其他运动属性**，如骑自行车赚钱这种，个人感觉可能稍显牵强，由于**外部设备**的要求，可能并不能在很大范围传播。比如或许大多玩家会愿意花几百u买一双nft鞋子，但不会先几百u买一辆自行车，再花几百u买一辆nft自行车… 这或许也是健身环大冒险相比于舞力全开的销量少很多的原因之一（实际个人认为健身环大冒险的运动多样性和游戏度都比舞力全开要高不少）。

当然还不得不提到**学习赚钱**的形式。比如存活了好几个月的学英语赚钱Let Me Speak，还有最近慢慢兴起的一些读书赚钱。对于学英语赚钱，或许可以有比较好的检测机制，只需要设置一些任务和问题，回答正确以后即可获得奖励。但是我个人比较怀疑读书的检测方式，如果纯粹按时间或章节，实际很容易被模拟，也缺乏较好的检测机制。

一些其他的太离谱的，局限性可能都会非常大，在此不做讨论。

## 经济模型分析

其实不管是什么赚钱，可能整体的经济模型都大体类似。大多是通过购买NFT的方式，使用NFT完成某项任务，获得代币奖励。达到一定门槛（如升级）后，可以花费一定成本进行铸造，得到新的NFT。

### 生息资产的生命周期

**由于绝大多数游戏设计的NFT为无限期生息资产（生息资产无生命周期），生息资产的收益率无上限，实际经济会难以长期稳定**。先入场的玩家可以无限期的进行挖提卖的操作，若预期目标为经济的长期稳定（日收益率基本恒定），则如果没有后期玩家的指数型涌入，经济系统很难维持。

或许游戏可以引入各种博彩机制来增强游戏性，或引入一些X的正向外部性（如运动健康，学习等属性），来让部分入场玩家减缓对收益的实际关注，减缓经济系统的崩溃。但是不可忽略的一点是，只要预期的收益稳定且足够有诱惑力，便会有大量工作室涌入，只要雇佣的成本低于预期的收益，都可以有利可图。**如果大R（重氪）玩家的实际经济“亏损”+新入场玩家的购买，不足以对冲掉打金玩家恒定日收益率吸血+项目方对手续费的抽取，则经济系统走向衰退或许会成为必然**。

其实在我2个月之前，[关于STEPN的经济模型分析](https://mirror.xyz/0xpineapple.eth/Mrb0Yzj4DK0g_xQzaevKqMQ7YkrWDOVNZyjzyep7csQ)中就有提到一种可能的解法，**加入生息资产的生命周期**。比如就像汽车，随着汽车越来越老化，平均每年的维修成本也会越来越高，或者性能越来越差。随着净收益慢慢下降，对于大多数理性人，总会有一个时间点，汽车需要报废，因为买一辆新车的收益会大于继续用这辆旧车。这时候如果能够结合一些NFT的燃烧机制，就可以让玩家心甘情愿的把NFT烧掉，给另一个NFT升星/加属性，或者获得一点小奖励。

但如果生息资产生命周期无限，即使加入燃烧生息资产机制，燃烧NFT去加强另一个NFT的操作永远都是可以得到性价比计算的。如果算收益会赚，那么经济被吸血更多，如果算收益会亏，那么这种玩法还是主要属于大R，又回到了前面的循环。

那么加入生息资产的生命周期后，经济模型会变成什么样子？我简化一下模型，就假设每天鞋子净收益不变，生命周期结束直接报废（LMS的方法）。以STEPN的跑鞋为例，假如买一双鞋子后，生命周期是60天，不管你跑不跑，到时候都会报废。我们设置初始回本周期是40天，如果你每天满额运动，就可以净赚20天的钱。当然对于一些比较懒惰的玩家，像买健身卡一样，之后不想跑了，只运动了30天，那么就会亏10天的收益。如果懒惰的玩家的数量比勤奋玩家多很多，那么代币产出减少，自然代币价格提高更加有利于勤奋玩家的运动，回本会更快，反之亦然。**实际是在用懒惰玩家的钱去奖励勤奋玩家**。

当然以上只是个最最简单的模型，但是至少它能够解决经济模型中最大的问题。如果我们把这个模型的变量增加很多，加入更多STEPN提出过的脑洞玩法，加入各种概率/博彩机制等等，这个复杂的经济模型就更有可能良性自循环，并且不至于让NFT的数量通胀。拿少量的特殊NFT赋予无限生命周期的能力（如创世NFT），可以让初始玩家更显尊贵。

其实这种类型的经济模式在web2应用里面随处可见，比如我用过的像扇贝这种背单词软件，会有类似的年卡。如果一年打卡满多少天，会退款或赠送大礼包。其本质其实是类似的，只是Web3的to earn应用难以避免的会让大多数玩家在入局时计算回本时间并关心收益，这一点想要彻底解决在我玩了这么几个月看来，实在很难。

### x2e项目的预期收益率

另一个或许无关经济模型的要点是，**一个项目可能短期的2earn收益可以维持很高，或许可以多倍的远超代跑/代刷的收益，但是长期一定是不可持续的**。可以说几乎所有的x2e项目/链游，都难以防止工作室的进入。只要预期的收益足够高，大量的工作室就会蜂拥涌入，但几乎不管多么高级的防作弊系统，都不可能防止真人代刷的“作弊”方式，比如STEPN的代跑，LMS的代学英语，Axie的代刷。所以不管游戏中大R/氪金玩家能够创造多少经济“亏损”，理论上都可以被工作室的吸血效应抹平。**长期稳定的收益，最多只能是和代刷成本基本持平甚至更低**。就应了那句话，“最终我们都只是在赚份黑奴的钱”。

即使是对于大多数发展的不错的庞氏游戏（老用户赚新用户的钱），也都会经历成长期-成熟期-衰退期的过程。但是不得不说，**一个做的比较好的庞氏，在用户指数增长的成长期，赚钱效应大多会非常明显**。但一旦新增用户的增长曲线慢慢放缓，到达成熟期后，风险就会增大许多。由于新增用户放缓，在场内的日收益率慢慢降低中，总有某个时刻大户的抛盘没有被足够的新增玩家承接住，可能在很短时间就开始了螺旋下跌过程。如果早期入场的用户可以无限期的赚钱，难以避免其会不断进行挖提卖操作，造成场内价值持续流出。如果玩家对未来币价没有良好的预期，复投玩家和新入场玩家数都会减少，每天挖提卖造成的净流出持续，死亡螺旋将很难阻止。

不过对于生息资产有生命周期的项目（勤奋玩家赚懒惰玩家的钱），相对来说庞氏属性不很明显，即使到达成熟期新增用户放缓甚至停止新增，只要勤奋玩家和懒惰玩家的比例大致恒定，且预期收益基本不高于代刷成本，物价也可以在低位相对稳定。

当然以上的种种都只是分析和提出一些设想，想要让一个十万百万DAU的应用经济运转良好，势必要考虑太多的因素，也注定会是一个很复杂的系统。

但是有一点我个人坚持的是，**经济的慢慢衰退比大起大落让玩家相对更容易接受**。前者玩家可以选择比之前计算的更久时间回本或者小割肉出局，但后者可能会造成巅峰期的不少玩家被深套，回本无望，游戏体验过差，同时大量利润被投机者吃掉，不利于项目长期发展。因此项目方要在规则中保留一些宏观调控的权限，在经济出现大波动时，进行一些必要的干预。


---

决定一个链游能不能火的，更多的是游戏的产品，形式和潜在用户数量，但决定一个链游能火多久或活多久的，更多的就要看经济模型了。

title: One Smpl Trick
body:
9–5 metaverses and weekend metaverses, touch grass metaverses and [touch simulation](https://www.ft.com/content/4be5677b-bc03-4e46-bbbb-68074e8dda6c) metaverses, living metaverses and dying metaverses. With a hypnotic timbre, Mark Zuckerberg tells a story about the world to come that says everything there will be just as it is here. Just as our room is now, so it will be in the world to come; where our baby sleeps now, there too it will sleep in the other world. And the clothes we wear in this world, those too we will wear there. Everything will be as it is now, just differently textured.

The familiarity of variable-poly surfaces, however, belies the novel forms of visuality that animate the metaverse. Beyond the illusory layer of avatars and environments, techniques such as subtle gaze direction and foveated rendering exploit research on human visual cognition, while computer vision algorithms are refined by data synthesized using computer graphics. For humans, these new images operate below the threshold of perception; for machines, they provide the foundation of perception. Machine learning models trained on synthetic data, which is diverse and perfectly labeled by design, generalize better than models trained on real data, enabling avatars to represent users in granular detail.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Z0PeTXBZUBO9hyIKVK9T3.jpeg?height=883&width=1365&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&)

SMPLverse NFTs use facial recognition to retrieve data synthesized by Microsoft to train face tracking algorithms for its mixed reality headsets. Like many pfp projects, the Microsoft dataset uses procedural generation to randomly create and render faces without any manual intervention. The images combine a generative 3D face model with a library of artist-created assets—including textures, hair, and clothing—and SMPL, a body mesh used to animate avatars in virtual environments. Although verisimilitude is formally irrelevant to machine learning, it remains the only method of achieving functional equivalence between real and synthetic data.

Visually, the training images suggest identity play, emulating the avatars whose naturalism they are meant to enhance. Their effect, however, is to attune algorithms ever more precisely to users’ physical selves: the dataset expresses how users appear *to* virtual environments as much as how they appear *in* them. The minting process, which matches your own face to a smpl, elaborates the tension between freedom and constraint—even a pool of 100,000 images is too small to produce consistent matches.

The market-driven development of immersive technologies constitutes its own form of vision. By fractionalizing Microsoft’s dataset into NFTs, SMPLverse inverts its function, redistributing the metaverse’s centralized assets through its paradigmatic decentralized property form.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ua2pugKf_c16nk4xt8MhA.png?height=512&width=1024&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&)

### Details

* There are 511+2 tokens available to mint.
* Each token allows you to submit one image through our webcam interface. Your submitted image will be written to the token as a hash. Our facial recognition model uses this hash to match your image to a smpl.
* When the image is matched, it receives one attribute: confidence. Confidence assesses the likelihood that your image matches the smpl you receive. Confidence is a declining measure: as more smpls are matched, your likelihood of receiving a high confidence match decreases. Conversely, your likelihood of receiving a smpl with stranger visual attributes increases.
* 7 rare smpls have an additional “head pose cluster” attribute, which entitles them each to 4.14% of secondary revenue. These rare smpls form a group of images clustered by head pose. As more rare smpls are matched, the bounds of the cluster will sharpen. To acquire a rare smpl, token holders must recognize the same patterns that a facial recognition system trained on the dataset would be optimized to recognize.

### Starkware简介

StarkWare 主要解决了区块链的可扩展性和隐私。 StarkWare 开发了一个完整的解决方案，使用 STARK 技术，通过 zk-Rollups 和 Validium 模式组成 Volition 来生成和验证计算完整性的证明。 StarkWare 的密码证明可以做到零知识、简洁、透明和后量子安全。 StarkWare 所研发的产品主要有： StarkNet、StarkEx、Cairo。

### 主要特点

* 可拓展性：StarkWare 允许区块链通过依赖在云中的链下证明者生成的加密证明进行大规模扩展，然后通过链上智能合约进行验证。
* 隐私性：zk-STARK 证明不会透露输入的私人信息。 结合其他加密工具，zk-STARK 可以完全且可证明地保护用户数据。
* 用户体验：通过 **Immutable** 和 **dYdX** 的例子，我们就可以体验到 StarkWare 所提供方案极强的拓展能力。 DiversiFi 的支付 TPS 可以达到 18k，Immutable 的 NFT 铸造费用仅需 0.2 美分，dYdX 的交易费用缩减到了 1/50。秒确认，费率几乎为 0，带来了极佳的用户体验。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JGt_gTxMyqtiHRMZrNw3Y.png?height=968&width=1521)

### 投资机构青睐

*  2018 年 1 月，完成 种子轮600 万美元融资，参投方包括 MetaStable Capital 和 Foodgate、Pantera、Polychain、Zcash 以及 Vitalik Buterin；
* 2018年10月，3000 万美元B轮融资由 Paradigm 领投，英特尔创投、Sequoia、Atomico、丹华资本、Wing、ConsenSys、Coinbase Ventures、Multicoin Capital 等跟投；
* 2021年11月，它以估值20亿美元筹集了5000万美元的C轮融资，该轮融资由红杉资本领投，Paradigm、三箭资本、Alameda Research等知名加密风投机构参投；
* 2022年5月25日，以80亿美元估值完成了1亿美元的D轮融资，此轮融资由Greenoaks Capital、Tiger Global等机构领投，所筹资金将用于产品和业务开发及生态系统的发展。

### 为什么获得众多聪明钱的关注？

仅仅过去不到半年，其融资估值超4倍，是什么样的项目在熊市中依然这么亮眼？

这可能要归于它所提供的产品。众所周知，以太坊网络拥堵导致的Gas费过高一直是它的痛点，扩容成为一种解决方案，产生了两种路径：ZK Rollup和Optimistic rollup。

StarkWare选择了第一种，并在ZK Rollup采用的零知识证明算法的基础上，提出了升级版的「zkSTARK」算法，以增强区块链的可扩展性（也就是升级版的zk-rollup）。目前，在Layer2扩容方案中，ZK Rollup扩容方案的落地代表是StarkWare和zkSync，而Optimistic Rollup方案的代表是Arbitrum和Optimism。

大家都知道前段时间的op项目让早期参与者和深度互动者获得了大量空投，而且op对钱包的选择也非常严格，抛弃了大量的机器人账户和投机者。那怎样与尚在襁褓的starknet进行互动呢？那就是尽早参与提前进入其测试网络，和项目方亲密互动提出建议和意见，为项目助力。

之前写过一篇文章介绍了Arken Finance，现如今Arken又推出了不可伪造的空投（**NFA**），允许代币空投作为NFT进行铸造和交易，这是一种全新的空投模式，在众多同类型项目中也是少见的，下面我们来了解一下这种NFA究竟有何魅力

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HYpvgoA3ifiQggLBsBoHb.png?height=729&width=1400)

首先我们需要知道**NFA**究竟是一种怎么样的空投模式。要了解**NFA**，必须了解发放空投的概念。DeFi 中的空投是营销活动，当项目所有者或开发人员向个人发放免费代币时，通常用作产生对特定代币/代币的需求的一种方式，当他们在交易所上市时可能会物超所值。有了空投，似乎每个人都是赢家。但是，有时空投也有一些缺点。

首先，DeFi 项目经常不得不面对“空投猎人”。与真正的代币投资者或交易者看到每个项目的潜力不同，在大多数情况下，这些空投猎人一旦能够这样做，就会立即出售代币。这会对代币经济和代币价值产生不利影响。

**那什么是 NFA 及其背后的机制？**

NFA 或不可替代空投由 Arken Finance 首次引入，以代表 $ARKEN 空投奖励在初始 DEX 发行（IDO）之前的真实价值。引入 NFA 的目的是为*2000 名*第一次空投的获胜者解锁空投福利，并有机会在 $ARKEN IDO 之前交易他们的部分奖励。每个 **NFA** 对每个排名都是独特的，存储不同数量的 $ARKEN 代币以及他们的特权和好处。一旦未来推出代币，这些 **NFA** 的持有者将能够索取存储在该 NFA 上的 $ARKEN。（通俗点讲，每个**NFA**存储了$Arken代币在里面，我们在市场中购买了NFA，不单单可以获得NFT，还可以获得里面的代币，出售**NFA**的时候也是连着代币一起打包出售，这无形当中将NFA的价值大大提高，也提高了代币的流动性）

通过创新的模式，那我们购买或持有NFA到底有什么好处呢？

如果您是 Arken Finance 的 NFA 持有者之一，以下是拥有这些 **NFA** 的好处：

* 享受个性化的排他性：拥有您的限量版 Arken NFT Avatar（当您连接钱包时，这也将显示在 Arken Finance 上！）。
* 解锁空投第 2 轮特殊特权（不同的 NFA 在第 2 轮空投中将具有不同的特征和能力）。
* 享受 Arken Finance 未来高级功能的折扣和免费试用。
* 启动令牌后兑换 $ARKEN。NFA 将在赎回后销毁。

当然，持有NFA也可以在市场出售，NFA也给予了一定代币价值的预期，如果了解更多的官方信息，可以关注官方推特或者进TG或DC了解

title: DAOs, Blockchain and Beyond
body:
**Since 2019, I've been investing and building across the blockchain and DAO ecosystem. Here are some things I've learned:**

**Will power:** Many decentralized communities share a common vision and are willing to fund that vision. Determination is key to success.

**Doing good:** Many projects in the ecosystem are focused on leveraging blockchain and DeFi for creating positive socioeconomic value. Projects such as ACRE DAOs, Popcorn and DoinGud are great use cases. 

**Human Interaction:** In spite of all the good willed projects coming out of the ecosystem, most fail to encourage authentic person to person relationship building. You can’t discount the importance of human interaction and relationships. 

**Ethics:** Let’s be honest; this ecosystem is riddled with *degens* who are capitalizing on gamified structures to make themselves rich. I don't think cut-throat business practices have a place in Web3.

**Comprehensive Understanding of Business:** Sure, your engineers can code smart contracts. However, does your team have an understanding of the complex employment, IP, corporate and ethical legal framework where these contracts operate? The answer is usually no. This is an integral part in the process. Many DAOs and projects fall short, creating greater weight on the ecosystem as a whole. 

**Receptive to ideas and constructive criticism :** Communication and free exchange of ideas is positive for the community. Not being open to varying opinions and concepts is restrictive and inhibits growth.

**Government:** Many people in the ecosystem are complete anarchists. I'm in favor of working *with* governments to leverage the impact of blockchain innovation. 

**Tooling and Design:** How can we onboard the next billion users with fragmented tooling and non intuitive interfaces? The answer is that we can't. We need to focus on designing products so easy to use that even your grandma can participate in on-chain activities.

**Organization and Leadership :** One of the biggest drawbacks to DAOs in particular is lack of structure. Thousands of people in a Discord channel won't be as productive as 3 well aligned team members. DAOs need structure, organization and clear leadership in order to be successful within their communities and between their communities.

**Education:** When BrikPay was launched, we set out to be the first company to bring useful smart contracts to the residential construction industry. Our goal was to give both contractors and homeowners security during home renovation with a data powered escrow contract. We underestimate the amount of education needed to onboard contractors / builders and to help them understand the value of the technology. We also faced a lot of pushback; as many contractors did not want their records "on the books" for auditing.

The same is true for the ecosystem as it stands today. 

 My vision is a world where we can leverage blockchain innovation to make society more equitable and accessible to all. Though we have a long way to go, I remain a hopeful optimist. 

Pasquale J. Scaife

之前写过一篇文章介绍了Arken Finance，现如今Arken又推出了不可伪造的空投（**NFA**），允许代币空投作为NFT进行铸造和交易，这是一种全新的空投模式，在众多同类型项目中也是少见的，下面我们来了解一下这种NFA究竟有何魅力

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HYpvgoA3ifiQggLBsBoHb.png?height=729&width=1400)

首先我们需要知道**NFA**究竟是一种怎么样的空投模式。要了解**NFA**，必须了解发放空投的概念。DeFi 中的空投是营销活动，当项目所有者或开发人员向个人发放免费代币时，通常用作产生对特定代币/代币的需求的一种方式，当他们在交易所上市时可能会物超所值。有了空投，似乎每个人都是赢家。但是，有时空投也有一些缺点。

首先，DeFi 项目经常不得不面对“空投猎人”。与真正的代币投资者或交易者看到每个项目的潜力不同，在大多数情况下，这些空投猎人一旦能够这样做，就会立即出售代币。这会对代币经济和代币价值产生不利影响。

**那什么是 NFA 及其背后的机制？**

NFA 或不可替代空投由 Arken Finance 首次引入，以代表 $ARKEN 空投奖励在初始 DEX 发行（IDO）之前的真实价值。引入 NFA 的目的是为*2000 名*第一次空投的获胜者解锁空投福利，并有机会在 $ARKEN IDO 之前交易他们的部分奖励。每个 **NFA** 对每个排名都是独特的，存储不同数量的 $ARKEN 代币以及他们的特权和好处。一旦未来推出代币，这些 **NFA** 的持有者将能够索取存储在该 NFA 上的 $ARKEN。（通俗点讲，每个**NFA**存储了$Arken代币在里面，我们在市场中购买了NFA，不单单可以获得NFT，还可以获得里面的代币，出售**NFA**的时候也是连着代币一起打包出售，这无形当中将NFA的价值大大提高，也提高了代币的流动性）

通过创新的模式，那我们购买或持有NFA到底有什么好处呢？

如果您是 Arken Finance 的 NFA 持有者之一，以下是拥有这些 **NFA** 的好处：

* 享受个性化的排他性：拥有您的限量版 Arken NFT Avatar（当您连接钱包时，这也将显示在 Arken Finance 上！）。
* 解锁空投第 2 轮特殊特权（不同的 NFA 在第 2 轮空投中将具有不同的特征和能力）。

title: DickToadz FAQ
body:
## General Information

DickToadz is a community-driven project based on CryptoDickbutts and CrypToadz by Gremplin NFT projects.  As super-fans of the original projects, we set out to build an experience like no other: create your own DickToadz or Toadbutts by selecting all of your own custom layers.

DickToadz is a 5,200 sized collection for mint + 69 1/1 pieces for post-mint airdropping, making it a total 5,269 NFT collection.

## Mint Details

DickToadz will mint on 6.9.22 (June 9th, 2022) at 12PM NOON EST

From 12PM EST - 3PM EST, all CryptoDickbutt/CrypToadz by Gremplin/G.I. Toadz/Premint list will be able to mint.  After 3PM EST, we will open it up to a public mint.

This is to ensure our core communities and supporters have first chance to get this unique experience.

Mint price is 0.069ETH.

Mint limit will be 10 per wallet.

Upon minting, your NFT will be a ***BUILDER ACCESS PASS.***  This ***BUILDER ACCESS PASS*** can be redeemed in our DickToadz NFT builder on our website.

### The DickToadz NFT builder will be opened for use 48 HOURS after the mint on 6.9.22 and will remain open for exactly ONE MONTH after sell-out.

Once you create your NFT, the metadata of your builder access pass NFT will be replaced with your creation!

**IMPORTANT:**

Please only use official links from [@dicktoadz](https://twitter.com/dicktoadz) on Twitter and [www.dicktoadz.com](https://dicktoadz.com)

## Team

**[SuperTightWoody](https://twitter.com/supertightwoody)**

**[Kerimbonia](https://twitter.com/kerimbonia)**

**[TheOG](https://twitter.com/TheOG2233)**

**[Loaf](https://twitter.com/LoafinETH)**

**[Papaya](https://twitter.com/papaya3359)**

**[Klee](https://twitter.com/kIeebie)**

## Rarity

“Rarity” will be created as the project is minted based on layers that are selected by those who mint.

Our project’s approach is based on user experience.  We believe it’s important to leave the door open for user creativity rather than have a traditional rarity by limiting traits or favoring one NFT over the others.

## The Builder

The DickToadz NFT builder will be opened for use upon minting shortly after the mint on 6.9.22.  After selling the project out- we will be keeping the builder open for ONE MONTH.  Once this month has passed, we will be closing the builder.  We recommend that you build your NFT and not hold on to the passes!

## Duplicates

Visual duplicates CAN be created if people select the exact same layers during the minting process.   Out of the *QUADRILLIONS* of possibilities, we don’t think there will be duplicates and if so, very few.  But with the naming feature added to the builder, there will be no two DickToadz alike.

**WE  PLANNED FOR EXACTLY 2.557 QUADRILLION POSSIBLE COMBINATIONS.**

## Guest Artists/Contributors

**LuckCryptoCat, Pixelord, Mathcastles, Slowbro/Babby, Anas Abdin, BRKFST World, World of Noun, Van Coleman, CrypToadettez, Plant Frens, Pixel Shop (Sumiez), Pixel Portraits (Thom), Loosetooth, Shepard Vito, The Sheep +**

*Other NFT Projects we have in the builder:*

*Dead Fellas, Punks, Bored Apes, Doodles, Nifty League, Tiny Dinos, Kaiju Kings, Cyberkongz, Cool Cats, Alien Frens, GI Toadz, Goblintown, Tiny Dinos, Howlerz, The Jims, Larva Chads, Nouns, Cryptoskulls + more*

## Donations

As builders and community members of both CryptoDickbutts and CrypToadz by Gremplin, we will be donating 20ETH to each of these treasuries post-sell out of DickToadz.

We believe that pushing the envelope by **creating** will both further the value proposition of the original collections, along with helping fund any future initiatives that can help our communities grow.

## The Feeding + Bounty Hunting

Gremp Corp. is keeping Gremplin\*\*\* alive by **feeding** him DickToadz.  Gremp Corp.’s leader, FronkBot, creates a menu with certain “styles” or “tastes”.  The feeding will be an airdrop mechanism where the DickToadz or Toadbutts that are created with these certain traits will be narrowed down and selected by Fronkbot for a special prize.

**POST SELL OUT**, our prizes for the feeding will include: 1/1 art from guest artists and core team, “licked” DickToadz, 1 Cryptodickbutt, 1 CrypToadz and various amounts of ETH.

Bounty hunting will be a post-mint menu where Gremp Corp will select a random category and people can build or “bounty hunt” DickToadz on OpenSea to hold what Gremplin\*\*\* is wanting to eat. These same prizes will turn over to the bounty hunting once the project is minted out.

\*\*\* *Gremplin the artist is not associated with this project.  We are using his name and likeness from the original CrypToadz by Gremplin NFT collection to continue the lore story.*

![Let the feeding begin...](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/smZRGVYfC1SiH-XsceNiz.png?height=500&width=1500)

## DickToadz Lore Story

Amidst the great war, remaining survivors of the **Dickbutts** and **Cryptoadz** attempt to escape **Gooch Island** and instead are thrust into the future of 6969, this is their story...

The year is 2022, the oppression of the Dickbutts and the Cryptoadz on Gooch Island has wreaked havoc on the landscape and its inhabitants since inception. Evil forces work to capture Cryptoadz while Dickbutts are forced to flee and find refuge elsewhere. Months go by, and slowly but surely, years at a time. What’s left of the population on Gooch Island is scarce and scattered. Fortunately, but unfortunately for some, they have evaded capture yet remain on the island in hiding with little to keep them going. It isn't until a small group of Butts and Toadz find each other and unite in a desperate effort to escape, which brings us to the present.

![Gremp Corp Bunker](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/CNp5vLZsSaE9ZPjNKPeok.png?height=1080&width=1920)

Whilst moving between established safe zones, the newly formed group stumbles upon what they can only assume is a bunker. Upon closer inspection it would appear to be abandoned, giving them the opportunity to pillage it briefly for resources that might help their cause. When entering, they quickly realize it is actually some sort of laboratory. Dormant machinery sits idle among the room, however, one very large looking computer occupies the center along with several tubes and a large empty metallic ring.

As they approach the equipment they see paperwork with illegible text, pictures of the self proclaimed Evil King of Gooch island, and a single, solitary jar… with a pickle. They know not what they are looking at yet they start to discuss how this could be their way off this dreaded island, if only they knew how to operate it. After some time and deliberation, the group decides this is their one chance to make something, if anything, happen in their favor and thus they begin to scour the machine of its many sockets and switches. After several minutes of haphazardly pressing buttons, flipping switches, and barbarically hammering the machine with blunt objects, they notice a hole with odd markings around it. In a last effort to get anything at all to happen, they decide to do the weirdest thing they can think of and insert the pickle…  The machine begins vibrating and whirring violently. The computer hums to life, releasing a cavalcade of beeps and chirps, the tubes at the side bubble vigorously, and finally, to the awe of everyone in the room, the metallic ring starts to form some kind of violet and black matter akin to that of space, until it completely fills the inner circle.

![Enter: The Lab](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/-hYVmv0h7tz5-wehknIyt.png?height=1520&width=2160)

With the pickle in hand, the newfound key to their success, both CrypToadz and Dickbutts approach the freshly created portal. Hesitant at first, and weary about diving head first into the unknown, they look at one another with an understanding that anything is better than their current situation. This portal must go somewhere better, more inhabitable, safe from the terrors of Gremplin’s horde. It MUST be… Right?

Before another thought could cross their tiny minds the portal begins to draw them in like that of a tractorbeam. They have no choice now, either stay and perish with the rest of Gooch Island, or risk everything for a better tomorrow. With that, they enter the swirling door to the unknown.

![Time traveling !vibez](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/V2vzLuDBaiAl_nIcDpp7V.png?height=940&width=1676)

Within an instant, the last survivors of Gooch Island disappear from the room, sucked into the abyss, along with their trusty pickle… followed by a picture of Gremplin, the lab, the secret bunker and eventually all of Gooch island. The portal was unstable, the machine was breaking, this was a one way trip and it was more than just the Toadz and Dickbutts in tow.

As unnatural a situation as it was, still more issues arose. While tunneling to their unknown destination, the DNA of all that went through the portal (animate and inanimate) became scrambled with other random objects from Gooch Island and whatever else they crossed in the tunnel, past and present! The situation was CC0ut of control, and when they reached the other side, they were met with a disappointing sight. These new beings appeared not in a new location, no, they were on Gooch Island... a bleak and desolate place where Gremp Corp. ruled the land... in the year 6969…

![There is no going back...or...IS there?  ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wCgU749cNxed6wIKxHobj.png?height=612&width=1090)

A dystopian city lay before our survivors, who stood in the shadow of a looming skyscraper that read “**GREMP CORP”** in bright neon lights. They find themselves in an even worse circumstance than the one they were fleeing.  Now, they have no choice- they must work together to survive in this new world. One of them in particular looks around at his people and starts to speak, making it clear that he will not let them be oppressed any longer. They look back at him, not knowing what his name is or was, they start chanting his new callsign… PICKLE, PICKLE! Now looking to one another they understand they are no longer who they once were prior to portaling. They were a ***new breed***, one that combined culture and vibes, with a new opportunity to stop the evil king and his now established empire, they were, the ***DICKTOADZ!***

Little do they know, the decrepit Gremplin is desperate to find a new source of sustenance in his weakened state, and his henchmen know just what he wants to feed on…

body:
之前写过一篇文章介绍了Arken Finance，现如今Arken又推出了不可伪造的空投（**NFA**），允许代币空投作为NFT进行铸造和交易，这是一种全新的空投模式，在众多同类型项目中也是少见的，下面我们来了解一下这种NFA究竟有何魅力

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HYpvgoA3ifiQggLBsBoHb.png?height=729&width=1400)

首先我们需要知道**NFA**究竟是一种怎么样的空投模式。要了解**NFA**，必须了解发放空投的概念。DeFi 中的空投是营销活动，当项目所有者或开发人员向个人发放免费代币时，通常用作产生对特定代币/代币的需求的一种方式，当他们在交易所上市时可能会物超所值。有了空投，似乎每个人都是赢家。但是，有时空投也有一些缺点。

首先，DeFi 项目经常不得不面对“空投猎人”。与真正的代币投资者或交易者看到每个项目的潜力不同，在大多数情况下，这些空投猎人一旦能够这样做，就会立即出售代币。这会对代币经济和代币价值产生不利影响。

**那什么是 NFA 及其背后的机制？**

NFA 或不可替代空投由 Arken Finance 首次引入，以代表 $ARKEN 空投奖励在初始 DEX 发行（IDO）之前的真实价值。引入 NFA 的目的是为*2000 名*第一次空投的获胜者解锁空投福利，并有机会在 $ARKEN IDO 之前交易他们的部分奖励。每个 **NFA** 对每个排名都是独特的，存储不同数量的 $ARKEN 代币以及他们的特权和好处。一旦未来推出代币，这些 **NFA** 的持有者将能够索取存储在该 NFA 上的 $ARKEN。（通俗点讲，每个**NFA**存储了$Arken代币在里面，我们在市场中购买了NFA，不单单可以获得NFT，还可以获得里面的代币，出售**NFA**的时候也是连着代币一起打包出售，这无形当中将NFA的价值大大提高，也提高了代币的流动性）

通过创新的模式，那我们购买或持有NFA到底有什么好处呢？

如果您是 Arken Finance 的 NFA 持有者之一，以下是拥有这些 **NFA** 的好处：

* 享受个性化的排他性：拥有您的限量版 Arken NFT Avatar（当您连接钱包时，这也将显示在 Arken Finance 上！）。
* 解锁空投第 2 轮特殊特权（不同的 NFA 在第 2 轮空投中将具有不同的特征和能力）。
* 享受 Arken Finance 未来高级功能的折扣和免费试用。
* 启动令牌后兑换 $ARKEN。NFA 将在赎回后销毁。

当然，持有NFA也可以在市场出售，NFA也给予了一定代币价值的预期，如果了解更多的官方信息，可以关注官方推特或者进TG或DC了解

body:
### Decentralized Crisis Management, Problem Solving, Coordination: Agave, the DAO of Gnosis Chain

### Intro

Alright, in this issue, I will be writing the story from a personal experience: How moloch struck. How Agave got rekt. How Agave, Gnosis and the community worked to find a resolution. How a reasonable compromise from all affected parties contributed to this resolution. How we organized to slay moloch. Critique of some practices. The way forward.

We, humans, are inherently irrational beings. And we are all used to reading stories since ancient times about how this irrationality results in destruction, in a very wide range of tragedies from a king’s life to the extinction of communities. Yes, all rekt stories we have seen in DeFi are tragedies, the actors of which share the same hamartia of those kings in the plays of Sophocles. And for that matter, I feel obliged to thank[ rekt.news](https://rekt.news/) for turning these stories into laughing matters and for rejuvenating yellow journalism. Otherwise, without humor, how can we keep trying new things if we are not going to have some fun in this space?

DeFi is still taking its baby steps. It has been only 2 years since Compound Finance started allowing decentralized lending and borrowing on-chain; then, a huge influx of other people tried their hand at experimenting with different stuff to make things better. Of course, there have been plain scammers and sociopaths trying to benefit off of people’s greed; but on the other hand, it brought about the rise of open-source, which used to be limited to a few nerds before crypto became widespread, allowing local networks (local in a sense that DAOs consisting of people sharing same values) to build stuff that would fulfill their own needs unlike the SaaS mindset of web2.

No, there’s no TL;DR.

A Little Bit of History

### 1Hive Deploying on xDai

When gas fees on Mainnet rendered it non-feasible for DAOs experimenting with on-chain governance after the famous DeFi summer of 2020, DAOs such as 1Hive decided to migrate to a chain where people would not hesitate to participate on-chain voting. As the first DAO to experiment with a novel, whale-resistant, participation encouraging governance system, namely Conviction Voting, 1Hive deployed its tools, which constituted the framework of what is today called Gardens, on xDai Chain.

Along with its governance tools, it was obviously necessary to deploy an automated market maker, which is Honeyswap, still in use by most DAOs on Gnosis Chain. And all these things happened before everyone and their grandma started popping up with alternative L1 EVM-compatible chains, the security and stakeholders of which are still questioned today.

And it was not only 1Hive, but other DAOs such as DXDao and DAOhaus doing experiments with on-chain governance practices also deployed their tools on xDai back in the day, which made the well–known argument that Gnosis Chain is the DAO-chain. These were all true DAOs, not your Daniele Sesta-and-0xSifu cash-grab projects leeching off of the retail with fraudulent practices.

***Money Market on xDai***

Well, when you deploy your own governance mechanism on a chain, you need other tools. That is exactly when discussions about having a decentralized money market on xDai began within the community, and specifically within 1Hive. And this was before Aave deployed on Matic (which is today’s Polygon after their rebranding). The basic idea was to have the tools to go on with our own business while allowing people with smaller portfolios to have the opportunity to experience decentralized finance. As punk as possible, after asking Aave to deploy on xDai, we had to make the decision ourselves and it turned out to be a Do-It-Yourself thing. That is how Agave was born with almost no funding at all! (The only funding that Agave received was 50 $HNY from 1Hive to create the first liquidity pool on Honeyswap.)

An xDai native project, providing decentralized borrowing and lending to the tight-knit community of the DAO-chain, Agave was embraced and used by the very people who have been working for again the very chain they have embraced as their home. Around 700 people from 1Hive, DXDao, Symmetric Finance, DAOhaus, BrightID, Giveth, Token Engineering Commons were using the native money market when the exploit happened. Even 1Hive native project NFBeez deposited their own revenue from the minting of the NFTs to Agave. Not to mention people with relatively small portfolios enjoying low-gas fees (when I say low, I literally mean low, like fractions of a cent)

***Gnosis/xDai STAKE Merger***

Back in November 2021, xDai STAKE community were surprised to see a proposal offering a merger between Gnosis DAO and xDai while they were expecting a rebranding of xDai, which had been supposed to be carried out by RaidGuild. To be frank, there was a little bit of a backlash from the STAKE holders upon this proposal. The reason was, mainly, that most holders of STAKE believed that xDai could also find its place in the race among the L1 EVM-chain considering the market cap of STAKE token was rather low compared to its competitors such as MATIC. In fact, there were even some people accusing this move by Gnosis DAO as a hostile takeover of the chain, as Gnosis DAO was given a grant of a considerable amount of STAKE tokens that they could use in governance. As a result of these discussions and arguments whether this is a takeover or not, huge drama within the community, an AMA session was conducted in the xDai/STAKE discord with the participation of people from both parties.

No one was against the merger, actually; the main concern was the short time period for the TWAP prices that would take place for swapping STAKE tokens into GNO. There were also a few other concerns and all were addressed during a rather heated session. In the end, the proposal was amended, and passed with overwhelming support on the Snapshot votes of both DAOs.

Thence began our journey with Gnosis DAO under the name **Gnosis Chain!**

### Agave Hack and How It Got Resolved

***Day of the Hack***

This is exactly where the story gets personal. 15th of March 2022, I woke up to this message:

![Yes, I sleep in the morning, wake up in the evening. That’s really 6.15 PM lol.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ViWK37VXj9SRIDVykdYdj.png?height=115&width=327)

What could I do? Sit down and cry as I lost my life savings? Well, as a non-dev person, after figuring out what was actually happening, the only thing I could do was to provide community support while the developers were trying to understand what exactly was the core of the issue that allowed the exploit to happen netting the hacker around $4.5M of non-utilized liquidity in the platform. Hence, I wrote this premature message on Agave Telegram:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NwTQvSfBlpc-V3h_4AJPd.png?height=305&width=438)

At the same time, another lending protocol, Hundred Finance, fork of Compound Finance, was also being exploited on Gnosis Chain. Although the attacker used a separate addy, we believe the attacker is the same person or entity.

***Technicalities***

Meanwhile, while checking Twitter to see the takes of other individuals who may be relevant to resolve the issue in addition to experts of solidity, we have seen these tweets:

Mudit Gupta’s take on technicalities:

[https://twitter.com/Mudit__Gupta/status/1503783633877827586](https://twitter.com/Mudit__Gupta/status/1503783633877827586)

Shegen’s analysis and reflections (btw, she also lost a considerable amount in the hack):

[https://twitter.com/shegenerates/status/1503852338917908488](https://twitter.com/shegenerates/status/1503852338917908488)

Yeah, Shegen’s Tweet is the one that correctly explained the issue. Anyways, these are the technicalities, and I will also include the post-mortems by both Gnosis Chain and Agave if you are curious for sure. But I’m also sure that you’re not here for the technicalities but the social aspect as the reader. You can go, check out what the technical background was that allowed the exploit to happen in these post-mortems:

Post-Mortem from Gnosis Chain’s Side:

[https://hackmd.io/@koal/SJiDiO0bc](https://hackmd.io/@koal/SJiDiO0bc)

Post-Mortem from Agave’s Side:

[https://twitter.com/Agave_lending/status/1512453965417533447](https://twitter.com/Agave_lending/status/1512453965417533447)

Okay, there’s a TL;DR for these post-mortems as I have already explained this to many people in simple terms before. The tokens from the OmniBridge were following a non-standart implementation that was designed to prevent people from accidentally sending tokens directly to the bridge contract. While it was a good-faith design, it was indicated in a 2020 audit report that this non-compliance with ERC-677 standard may pose problems. And it was not proactively shared with the developers of the ecosystem. And Agave, as a direct fork of Aave V2 contracts, assumed that the tokens listed on the platform were compliant. Therefore, in almost 2 years, no one other than the attacker saw that this would cause any problem.

***Agave DAO 🤝Gnosis DAO***

Let us get back to the social aspect, right? Typically, in these kinds of rekt scenarios, you either expect responsible teams to just immediately reimburse users of their lost funds or just remove their on-chain credentials if they don’t care about the users at all. Well, this story was a bit different. Obviously, Agave at around $3M Market Cap, which was already ridiculously lower than its TVL at the time of the hack, did not have the funds to reimburse its users, who happened to be also long-time contributors to Gnosis Chain rather than mercenary capital chasing ridiculously high-yields on their deposits. What could be done? It’s turning into a Prisoner’s dilemma situation with three parties: Gnosis DAO, Agave DAO, and the Users. Defect + Defect + Defect? Or Collaborate + Collaborate + Collaborate?

Remember the “hostile takeover” accusations to Gnosis DAO above during the Gnosis/xDai Merger proposal. As unfortunate as it seemed, this incident was a huge opportunity to render the accusers wrong during the arguments in November 2021. On the day of the hack, what we saw from the founders of Gnosis DAO, both Martin and Stefan, were nothing more than reassuring public statements on Twitter indicating a willingness to collaborate.

[https://twitter.com/koeppelmann/status/1503732455693598720](https://twitter.com/koeppelmann/status/1503732455693598720)

[https://twitter.com/StefanDGeorge/status/1504862943439163409](https://twitter.com/StefanDGeorge/status/1504862943439163409)

***Mainstream Media Being Mainstream***

![you fucker!](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TX26hzL15teDjHUzl10Ne.png?height=1506&width=1731)

On the same day of the hack, mainstream media sources like Fortune appeared like scavengers to gnaw on the already assumingly dead platform. They knew what they were doing as they bent the words from Shegen’s mouth, which she also explained in [her tweet](https://twitter.com/shegenerates/status/1504164665395486720). To be frank, we were not expecting a good take from a magazine like Fortune, but the keywords they used in the article’s link was outright a malicious attempt to downgrade the experiment we like to call DeFi.

[http://web.archive.org/web/20220316182009/https://fortune.com/2022/03/16/crypto-investor-scam-agave-defi/](http://web.archive.org/web/20220316182009/https://fortune.com/2022/03/16/crypto-investor-scam-agave-defi/)

Why the hell would you put that word “scam” there if you had good intentions, right? Was the incident similar to your ponzi scams or your everyday MLM schemes attacking the vulnerable people who had no idea about finance? Or was it some kind of an asshole just taking advantage of a code vulnerability?

### Reimburse But How?

Anyways, we can talk about the mainstream media constantly criticizing crypto and DeFi experiments on false grounds in an attempt to demonize change to protect the status quo until forever. Let us get back to what happened later.

In such incidents where an attacker is able to steal money and the protocol is competent, has the liquid funds to make users whole, or in less decentralized environments, either the protocol itself covers the losses or the infrastructure provider such as the chain bails out the protocol. Upon checking [rekt leaderboard](https://rekt.news/leaderboard/) and the socials of the projects listed there, you can see that most of the time, these protocols all tried their hand to resolve the issue one way or another. Hence, in order to demonstrate that it has a strong community, Agave DAO also promised to do the best they can to reimburse users’ losses. Coincidentally, the users of Agave were also the contributors to the DAO as well as the entire Gnosis Chain ecosystem since the early days of the [DAO-Chain](https://mirror.xyz/0xBcBfF58E166C78a0f7200Cc134b3b358eF0974E9/Ps13aAPsJp0kDEx7BnYlbMs2Ui1-2INQWCZUg3zbjg0).

The problem was that Agave did not have the funds to reimburse everyone right away. And a typical bail-out by some party that you would normally see again in less decentralized environments would not be the ideal solution. It had to be done in a truly DAO-way.

Consequently, some high level discussions between Agave DAO and Gnosis DAO were initiated and users were also invited to share their opinions on Discord. And there were some lively, friendly discussions and ideas were offered. If you want to get the feel, you can still join [Agave Discord](https://discord.gg/B9q3xWEQK9), scroll up in the #general channel.

So, the high level discussions between the affected parties [a pre-proposal](https://forum.gnosis.io/t/should-gnosis-help-reimburse-some-of-the-lost-funds-on-agave/4215) was submitted to Gnosis DAO, initially asking around 55% of the lost funds during the hack in return for auctioning 25k AGVE tokens to Gnosis DAO while 20% of the funds to be reimbursed would be open for discussion as to how it would be collected.

After some community feedback, and an almost three-hour long AMA held in the Agave Discord server, time for high-level communication between DAO representatives again! Then, the proposal to Gnosis DAO by Agave DAO was to be amended again. Which in the end led to the emergence of [GIP-34](https://forum.gnosis.io/t/gip-34-should-gnosis-dao-support-in-a-reimbursement-plan-to-the-agave-community/4588). TL;DR:

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_mvxHq1upYHNN_01HxKsz.png?height=321&width=710)

And the proposal passed with overwhelming support on Snapshot except for a few nay-sayers.

### Gnosis Chain Hard Fork

On the other hand, while all these discussions about the reimbursement of user funds and the future of Agave were going on, Gnosis Chain was also supposed to carry out a hard fork on the Chain. And even though hard forks are not embraced in the Ethereum ecosystem, the biggest one of which was the one performed after the infamous the DAO hack leading to the emergence of Ethereum Classic (ticket $ETC), which has basically seen almost no development on it after the fork. All stakeholders following suite after [GIP-31](https://forum.gnosis.io/t/gip-31-should-gnosis-chain-perform-a-hardfork-to-upgrade-the-token-contract-vulnerable-to-the-reentrancy-attack/4134) (fortunately), proposing the hard fork on Gnosis Chain to upgrade the token contracts (legacy ones) to prevent re-entrancy attacks that have caused both Agave and Hundred Finance exploits on the same day around the same time frame, the hard fork support by OpenEthereum (sadly deprecated last month) was named after Agave, and the rest was history. Agave became the DAO of the Gnosis Chain.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Bf3yNsFXiY00DKeF-0NmV.png?height=59&width=622)

### Good News!

Well, fast forward to today, after the loan from [Karpatkey](https://twitter.com/karpatkey), everyone affected by the exploit on the 15th of March is able to claim 80% of their net losses at

[https://reimbursement.agave.finance/](https://reimbursement.agave.finance/)

[https://twitter.com/Agave_lending/status/1533708903824900096](https://twitter.com/Agave_lending/status/1533708903824900096)

### Final Remarks

Crypto is neutral no matter what your everyday policymakers or no-coiners or non-believers in this technology love to assert to protect their hidden agendas. And yeah, all human beings have their hidden agendas to protect. That’s what defines society and the power struggle between whatever fucking ideology you may want to support or not. There are assholes everywhere as much as there are people with good intentions trying to better the world even for the assholes.

![Hi Z!](https://c.tenor.com/7YtKgtexDD0AAAAC/zizek-ideology.gif)

But, a huge BUT, an alternative is possible and that’s why we are all spending our valuable time to make things as accessible, inclusive, trustless, permissionless, transparent, full-of-kindness as possible, oftentimes without expecting anything of value in return. We do not have to sacrifice freedom for the sake of some artificial security provided by governments or whatever regulatory body. As Elinor Ostrom has already pointed out in her groundbreaking novel-prize winner work *Governing the Commons*, when you give the very people who are affected by the exact source (call it common pool resources or public goods or DeFi in our space) the autonomy to have control over the use, they will find the best outcome without any outside intervention. And this outside intervention is more costly anyways (but this will constitute the main subject of a future issue of daoApe). These eight design principles are more powerful than your typical outside regulatory body or your private institutions will ever be.

Let us embrace this innovative technology despite the assholes, scammers, cash-grabbers, exploiters, selfish bastards. Cause you know, they are everywhere. Let us all coordinate to slay the Moloch.

Also, huge thanks to the Monstrosity, Stonky, Luigy, Anisoptera, ZedKai, Mojmir, Martin, Stefan, Karpatkey Members, Claud,  Makerman, Wunderbernd, Svantetobias, Gigadig and all the Agave users and whose names I forgot to include here for helping us achieve this! You are all great people, and may everything in your life come true as good as you wish! Love you all.

title: Geode 流动性质押方案
body:
文字的起因是昨天Multicoin一笔投资。他们领投了一个做流动性质押白标方案的项目。一直关注质押赛道，特别是流动性质押，所以看完项目后，想把自己想法总结一下。

首先解释两个词。白标（whitelabel）就是项目方开发完一个商品或者产品，让不同的团队贴上自己的商标就可以进行售卖。流动性质押就是用户通过某个协议或者平台质押了某种代币，接着该协议给你对应的质押代币。你可以在获得质押收益的同时，在别的Defi项目中使用质押代币。

在当前主流的流动质押方案中，只要是通过在协议中质押，无论你的代币最终被分配到哪个节点，你只会获得一种质押代币（比如stETH，rETH）。这么做的一个好处是简易话和标准化。质押用户不用自己去比较节点的优势和劣势，协议层帮助筛选。第三方Defi项目在集成质押代币时，也只需要集成一次。并且，不用同时为多个质押代币提供流行性。

![Geode Overview](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s5MAt-2pt-XiQkn6z8jx-.png?height=478&width=1082)

回到Geode这种白标的方案。它希望让更多的Defi协议或者Dao组织通过Geode平台搭建属于自己的流动性质押方案。这些项目方可以用很少的代码量就可以快速的把产品跑起来。每个白标方案都有属于自己的质押代币（比如质押AVAX，获得AVAX_A）。项目方可以为自己的白标产品搭建验证节点或者寻找别的验证节点合作。当用户在该产品下质押时，代币会委托（delegate）给项目合作的验证节点。在此情况下，每条链的质押，可能会同时出现多家流动性方案和多个质押代币。每个流动性方案都需要为自己的质押代币提供好的流动性，并且为它提供金融工具或者让别的Defi项目集成它。Geode收入来源是通过用户退出质押时收取一定比例的退出费。

Geode更像是流动性质押的中间件或者说是平台，类似淘宝一样的平台。它提供好各种工具和插件（质押代币管理，预言机更新质押回报。验证节点管理等）。把开阔市场和寻找合作伙伴的事情留给项目方自己。

Geode不仅可以在一条链提供N个白标服务，而且可以扩展到多条EVM甚至是非EVM的链上。

当前Geode已经把服务部署在Avalanche上，Avalanche上的质押量为65%。Geode能从这65%中获得多少TVL也会是接下来的一个重点。

title: Day 12: Redeem your skills on RabbitHole and build a web3 resume
body:
> **CORE CONCEPTS**
>
> *We’ve already introduced [the concept of composability](https://mirror.xyz/cerv1.eth/s1UwRJxhTi76PdFlS6hqN8kHqe9oVImbGlTtzE_IHFQ) -- that is, the power to use open data and source code to build new applications on top of existing ones. The same features that make it easy to follow a user’s activity on the blockchain make it possible to verify one’s knowledge or mastery of a topic. Today, we’ll try out one of the first applications that capitalizes on the ability to view a user’s on-chain skills progression: RabbitHole.*

### The traditional resume vs the on-chain resume

A resume is a document that provides an overview of your professional qualifications, including relevant work experience, skills, education, and accomplishments. Many professionals spend hours formatting and word-smithing their resumes.

A traditional resume is a heavily curated, one-page synthesis of all the experiences and skills you feel are most relevant and attractive to an employer. Although few employers crosscheck the truthfulness of what’s on your resume, there’s an implicit honor code that anything you put on it should be verifiable.

The idea of an “on-chain resume” is nascent but stands to eliminate much of the curation and verification challenge. You can prove that you attended certain learning events through your POAPs. You can demonstrate that you are capable of performing certain tasks by sharing your transaction history. title: Manually adding Ethereum token details to Metamask
body:
Metamask is the veritable Swiss army-knife of the Ethereum ecosystem, cementing its place as the most popular wallet interface in crypto in recent years. Despite this, the app still lacks some basic features including the ability to display Ethereum tokens (aka ERC-20 tokens) by default.

For newer users in particular this is often cause for confusion - as evidenced by the amount of posts on r/ethereumnoobies regarding tokens the user fears they have lost.

Given the frequency of such posts, I have created this guide to obviate the need to rehash the same information for each such post. 

Before we get to that, here’s a brief summary of Metamask for those less familiar with the app.

**A Metamask refresher**

Metamask’s wallet interface for Ethereum based protocols\* is available as a browser extension on Chrome, Brave, Firefox & Edge. There is also a Metamask mobile app, though for the purpose of this guide instructions will focus on the browser version.

For optimal security, each Metamask installation should be initiated via the app’s website at metamask_io - as opposed to searching for Metamask in Google’s store due to instances where phishing versions of Metamask have been carelessly listed by Google.

I also recommend using a hardware device (HD) such as a Grid+ or Ledger Nano with Metamask. This provides optimal security by encrypting your wallet’s private key and using two factor authentication where you the user respond to information using both Metamask’s and your HD device’s screen and keys.

You can also import your wallet’s private key directly into Metamask though this is not recommended due to the possible presence of malware on your PC capable of phishing this information to access to your wallet.

**Adding tokens to Metamask’s list**

To the main task - of adding tokens that do not appear in Metamask’s token list. 

Under “Assets” refer to the section displaying ETH in your wallet in the app. Beneath this, you will see the following text:

*“Don’t see your token? Refresh list or import tokens.”*

If clicking “Refresh” fails to reveal your token, entering “Import Tokens” and “Search” sometimes reveals common tokens like $USDC that when clicked will be added to the list. Otherwise you will need to click “Custom Token” and enter a token’s details on the following page.

This information can typically be obtained via Etherscan_io. Entering the token’s initials (eg, “UNI” for Uniswap) in the website’s main search panel will generate a list of options with the relevant token often appearing in the top results.

Otherwise, providing the full name of the token may be required before you can locate the respective page. Note: be wary of fake versions of a token that use the same name and symbol when conducting this search - by noting if there is a blue check mark next to “token summary” and observing if the token’s symbol is displayed.

When you have located the token you are looking for on Etherscan, copy text next to “Contract” and paste this information into Metamask the “Token Contract Address” pane on the respective page. The other two fields will typically auto-populate following this; if not, return to Etherscan and take note of these details to enter manually as above.

Finally, click “Add Custom Token” and you will hopefully see this token & the correct balance in your wallet in Metamask.

\*These instructions refer to tokens on Ethereum’s main chain although similar procedures apply for Ethereum’s layer two solutions (including Arbitrum and Optimism); Ethereum’s side-chains (including Gnosis & Polygon) and protocols like Avalanche using the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) standard.

body:
> 本文由[YuDAO](https://discord.gg/YuDAO)出品，作者：@lanli|蓝犁  @tnkrxyz
>
> 欢迎加入YuDAO，纯正Web3社区，共建共享共有。

### 本文主要回答的问题

* Chainlink所处赛道和赛道价值
* Chainlink的赛道地位、护城河以及主要指标
* 生态以及生态价值
* 收入、成本、估值、代币以及投资建议

## 一、Chainlink基本情况及赛道分析

Chinalink是一个去中心化预言机，是目前使用最为广泛的预言机。项目始于2014年，2017年募资3200万美元，发售3.5亿代币。

代币总量10亿，已流通4.6亿，当前（2022年6月9日）价格$9.28，总市值排名21，历史最高为$52.7，目前-82%。

Chainlink在这个牛市里表现不佳，5/19之前价格ATH达到 52，之后未恢复ATH，而目前更是只有ATH的12%(6.4)；对比之下，ETH在11月再次达到ATH，而目前价格是5/19之前高点的是ATH的42%, uni是5/19 ATH的11%，DPI (defi 蓝筹，不包括Link)是ATH的14%。

![Link走势图](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/owylLK9ZvwtPXJJTJ2iU5.png?height=1056&width=1297)

可以说，Link在本次牛市中和defi蓝筹涨跌幅差不多，都跑输以太。

区块链这个周期到了今天，处于一个市场证伪的阶段。整体上区块链有四个高潜力应用：价值存储、defi (金融）、nft、Gamefi。

——其中价值存储共识最强，如比特币被认为对应法币来讲，是最为可靠的资产，其价值叙事尽管 价格波动剧烈，但已经得到最为广泛的认可。

——NFT在Yuga制造的大FOMO之后，迎来了一波由蓝筹带动的下跌，整个市场的成交金额只有高峰期的几十分之一。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0__gDAqKMiTRfQt_phxbE.png?height=427&width=1174)

——GameFI领域，P2E、X2E等模式被广泛质疑，gamefi正陷入低潮。

——DeFI领域本就在牛市后半段出现剧烈下跌，而在Luna崩盘之后，市场怀疑加剧，TVL从最高点的186b降低到83b，跌幅超过50%。

Defi是区块链最核心的应用，而defi今天颓势的核心原因之一就是defi的外部性不够—— 有点像一个游乐场，在内部空转。未来的defi以至于整个web3，必须具备外部性。而Chinalink就是web3和外部链接的一个重要接口。

Chainlink是预言机赛道的龙头，有着最为庞大的生态，其采取的开源开发模式，使得项目在数据提供商、节点运营商、智能合约开发者、研究者、安全审计人员等全方面获得较快扩张。

Chainlink目前已经发展成为已发展成为每个新兴智能合约垂直领域使用最广泛的去中心化预言机解决方案，包括DeFi、保险、游戏、NFT等。

目前官方白皮书已经进入2.0时代，在安全性、扩展性、质押机制等方面有全方位的更新，用官方的说法是“重新定义去中心化预言机网络的功能”。

具体可以观看官方提供的视频，自带简中字幕：

[https://youtu.be/7Ow8uN1TmxA](https://youtu.be/7Ow8uN1TmxA)

对于普通投资者来说，作为头部的预言机，其生态究竟如何？未来能有怎样的发展？持有代币可以有何种赋能等等是更加关心的问题。

但让我们从专业一点的内容开始，更有利于科学地决策。

## 二、安全性分析

作为预言机，在去中心化金融等诸多场景中，扮演着极为重要的角色。试想一下，如果多个预言机给数字货币或NFT借贷平台报出错误的价格，则立即会导致用户资产和交易受到重大损失。因此，安全性是预言机的生命线。

首先来看去中心化程度， Link的节点选取有Permission，每个价格大约有21-30个节点形成一个DON做报价。采用双层验证机制，DON如果多数串谋则任何一个DON的节点都可以举报给“二层裁决”，二层裁决由Aave等Link的用户组成，有比较强的动机不作恶。这是2.0更新中的重要内容，感兴趣深入研究的读者可以参阅这篇[官方文档](https://blog.chain.link/explicit-staking-in-chainlink-2-0/)。

其原理是在“加密经济学”的基础上构建信任关系，类似于对比特币发动51%攻击所付出的经济代价如果高于所能获得的利益，则没有足够动机发动51%攻击。

但是对于各个节点构建起来的安全性，也有一些质疑的声音，如[《Chainlink 2.0 白皮书问题出在哪？》](https://www.jinse.com/blockchain/1081588.html)等。

据官方说法，其运作方式大致包括：

节点会有staking在节点里做质押，如果出现数据造假，导致了DeFi项目受损，质押在智能合约里面的这些币将全都要被罚掉。节点确实由Chainlink选择，对节点的要求非常高，不是任意数据提供商都可以成为我们的节点。我们一定要确保数据的安全可靠。之后在节点的选取上去中心化程度会更高，不会再有类似白名单制的方式，每个节点获取多少工作量，能给多少项目喂价，都取决于它以往的历史工作记录。

Chainlink 2.0白皮书中引入了“超线性权益质押”（super-linear staking）的概念，这在现有的权益质押模式上往前迈出了一大步。超线性权益质押要求攻击者的资金量必须超过所有预言机节点保证金总和的二次方才能成功入侵DONs。DONs拥有独特的集中报警器系统（alerter system）和双层裁决系统（two-tier adjudication system），为用户提供更大的加密经济安全保障，可以抵御其他系统无法抵御的猛烈攻击。

在极少数情况下，由一级预言机网络生成的预言机报告引发争议，由下面进一步描述的看门狗/警报机制触发，争议将由速度较慢的二级委员会解决，该委员会由成百上千的独立 Chainlink 用户，例如 Aave、Synthetix、Compound 等。 如果曾经产生争议，这些用户将使用 DECO 提供 零知识证明 来自一个或多个数据提供者的基于 DECO 提供高效、低成本、防篡改的仲裁，让二线参与方在不接触原始数据源的情况下也能解决争议。

*最近几天关于[Chainlink的多签钱包安全性](https://twitter.com/ChrisBlec/status/1531377495257366530)推上有比较多的讨论，核心是Link的协议更新由一个多签钱包（4/9）控制，而因为Link和defi众多协议的嵌套，如果这个4/9多签被攻破（或者被政府强制），则可以对整个defi生态带来巨大的破坏。*

我们认为，Link的去中心化程度较弱，和ICP类似，但是采用二层裁决以后，基本上可以保证一层节点没有动机作恶。暂时把Link的去中心化程度和安全等级定位为约等于ICP，因为这两个协议对于每个具体应用的节点数差不多(ICP叫子网、Link叫Don）。

## 三、生态业务及估值分析

Chainlink传统业务：

* *Chainlink喂价：针对一系列资产提供丰富的链上金融市场数据，并为Aave、Synthetix以及dYdX等顶尖DeFi应用保障几十亿美元的价值。这也是Link目前主要的业务*
* *Chainlink VRF：利用链上加密证明机制生成可验证的随机数。比如帮助Aavegotchi铸造具有可验证稀有属性的NFT；为PoolTogether公平地选出无损彩票的中奖者。*
* *Chainlink储备金证明：为智能合约提供链上数据，按需审计通证资产储备，比如TUSD和PAX等稳定币以及跨链通证。*
* *Chainlink外部适配器：为开发者提供工具，接入任何链下数据源或API接口。比如帮助Arbol的农作物参数保险获取天气数据；为Everpedia预测市场的用户获取美国总统大选结果。*

关于收入部分，在官方文档中有一些简单叙述：

> 从 dApp 费用的角度来看，多个 Chainlink 预言机网络现在已经开始盈利。这些是 dApp 为使用 Chainlink 服务而支付的费用。考虑到许多区块链网络继续依赖区块奖励来激励节点性能，仅基于费用的 Chainlink 预言机网络盈利能力是一个独特的里程碑。一些更广泛使用的区块链依赖于[60-70%](https://bitinfocharts.com/comparison/fee_to_reward-btc-eth.html#alltime)的块奖励。

![盈利图表](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8bEgSZSqMIonwmz-f75CB.png?height=1208&width=1871)

由于 Chainlink 的[链下报告协议 (OCR)](https://blog.chain.link/off-chain-reporting-live-on-mainnet/)的效率、Chainlink 预言机网络所运行的区块链的效率提升以及用户需求的增加，某些 Chainlink 预言机网络已经完全盈利并且不需要区块奖励或任何形式的预言机奖励。

随着 dApp 使用更多的 Chainlink 服务，并且构建了新的 dApp 来使用 Chainlink 服务，这创造了一种逻辑动态，其中 dApp 费用流向 Chainlink 预言机节点运营商。

这里提到的“多个”oracle盈利，那么笔者假设应该在10-20个左右，而Chainlink现在有670个oracle network，所以整体盈利能力应该还比较差。

在收集资料的过程中，Chainlink的数据可得性比较差劲，比较像一个web 2公司，但我们仍然努力对4个版块进行了搜集：

### 1.Data Feeds

提供链上/链下的oracle，以价格(price) oracle为主，包括BTC, ETH以及各种token的价格信号，以及一些美国股票的报价。

在Github上，搜索 “aggregatorv3interface extension:sol” (ChainLink的data feed的接口) 有37k smart contract文件使用"AggregatorV3Interface"，而"uniswap oracle extension:sol" (包括uniswap v2和v3)有30k smart contract文件。虽然不是一个科学的对比（Chainlink还有新的FeedRegistry接口以及旧的v2），至少从一个侧面反映Chainlink的data feed被普遍应用，成为众多defi dapp的基础设施之一。

虽然应用广泛，但是目前Chainlink所有的data feed都是免费使用，Chainlink目前尚未能从中获取任何收入。

### 2.Verifiable Random Function （VRF）

因为EVM和其他链上面的所有状态都是公开的，理论上链上的状态都是确定性，因此无法产生真正的随机数。

Chainlink为此提供了可验证的随机函数(VRF)供其他smart contract调用。这项服务是收费的，但目前的使用率和费率（2 $LINK/Request），收入相当小。

根据Dune上的数据，VRFCoordinatorV1在Mainnet上5月截止27日止request数为76，收入152 $LINK，当然最高的2月request达到3927（Dune上尚无v2的数据）。BSC和Polygon上的request数比Mainnet高至少几个数量级，5月分别达到6272和341535，但是这两个链上的收费也较低。

我们制作了[Dune Dashboard](https://dune.com/tnkrxyz/Chainlink)统计了Chainlink VRF的使用和收入情况，

![Verifiable Random Function Mainnet使用和收入](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U4ba31jZhD5Fxb_hBemz0.png?height=517&width=951)

### 3.Chainlink Keepers

Chainlink Keepers是一个smart contract自动化工具，允许用户在指定条件下调用smart contract。

每个keeper由两部分组成：设定条件部分（例如指定时间或ETH/USD达到指定价格）由用户的smart contract function定义（这部分运行在chainlink的node上，避免运行在链上的高昂gas费用），第二个部分是链上的contract。当设定条件满足是，chainlink自动调用第二个链上的contract。可以想见keeper对Defi套利科学家、liquidator等相当有用。

keeper同样是收费服务，2021年5月在mainnet发布。在mainnet, BSC, 和polygon上使用和收入情况跟VRF类似：mainnet用户少，五月至目前324个request，收入1071 $LINK，Polygon有7488个request，但收入只有106 $LINK, BSC上2005个request, 收入399 $LINK。

### 4.Any API

Any API是Chainlink还在测试研发尚未正式发布(deploy)的产品。该产品将允许链上contract通过它和任何web2 API交互。

总体而言，就目前Chainlink产品线的收入相对其估值可以忽略不计。不过这几个产品很好的代表了Chainlink善于找到细分领域，执行、做出创新的产品。但VRF，keeper主要服务于defi, web3开发者，相对小众；Data Feeds使用多，目前免费。另一个角度来看，Link是一个立足长远的项目。

目前付给节点的奖励通过LINK支付，30天link reward（给节点）:1,300,326，按照现在的价格($9)，大约是每个月11M USD，每年130M USD的费用

*基于以上，暂时没法做有效的基于收入和利润的估值。目前主要还是叙事驱动。而叙事驱动在熊市里基本无用，在下一轮牛市里也许可以推高估值。*

## 四、LINK2.0新业务方向及叙事

*Link 2.0白皮书中，拓展了多个新功能：*

### 1.链下计算/混合计算

多重去中心化预言机网络”（下文简称DONs）框架，框架中有多个去中心化的预言机网络，并可以实现互操作性。高级链下计算功能让DONs能够为智能合约提供通用门户，并可兼容所有区块链。智能合约不仅能够访问任何链下资源，还能够接入链下计算环境运行代码，弥补区块链在成本、速度、隐私和技术方面的局限性。

因此，Chainlink可以为混合型智能合约提供安全灵活的全栈解决方案，将链上代码与关键的链下计算相结合。这些混合型智能合约将催生出新型去中心化应用，在可扩展性和保密性上都实现重大提升，而这两者都是区块链实现大规模应用的关键要素。

从这里的描述，Link链下计算是一种和layer2有相似点的功能，但和layer 2有两个关键差异：第一link的链下计算安全性不由layer 1保障，而是由link机制保障；第二link的链下计算并不是智能合约，而是传统的计算（如aws上的程序）。

这里澄清一个需求点，如果链下计算仅仅是为了offload链上计算：这个在以太上有众多rollup解决方案，目前看这个应不会是Chainlink主要优势所在。

有一些有意思的可能用例，例如：银行付款（直接连接银行系统）、外部支付（类似外汇）、债券、现实资产、企业数据、保险等。

这种混合计算是Chainlink 的独特优势，因为它本来就已经接了众多数据源。而且混合计算的实用性比较广泛，可以用在很多不同的领域。但目前真实用例还不是很多。也许是因为可以做的太多，而这个范式太新，所以需要比较多的推广。

另外，混合计算也不仅仅是Link的独门绝技，例如ICP、AKT等，直接把云服务搬上区块链，并且和公链体系相连接，也可以实现类似的web 2/ 3的对接。和Link的差异是，ICP/ AKT需要开发新的应用，而Link更像是与已有web 2应用的链接 - 也许更适合大企业。

这里做一个推断，后续Link如果在混合计算这块能有比较多/大的真实用例的话，那么下一轮牛市也许有估值冲高的机会。

### 2.CCIP跨链、多链协议。

CCIP是和一系列跨链桥、跨链交互协议，如anyswap、layer0、Axelar、IBC等竞争的一个协议，主要目的是为了实现跨链的消息交互，进一步实现协议的跨链（例如在matic上调用以太上的uniswap等）。

跨链是22年初比较热的一个话题，因为这个时间多链是相对的市场共识（虽然v神发了文章讲了跨链的安全性问题）。但是随着Luna的衰落，以太 defi的TVL份额回升到60%左右，今天的多链假设实际上受到挑战。

另外，跨链的标准不一，包括前面讲的多家竞品以及新进入的开发中的竞品，跨链这个领域的竞争可以说刚刚起步，所以CCIP是否能取得优势地位，不确定性比较大。

跨链这个领域，Chainlink当前并无突出优势，能否得到市场认可只有边走边看了。

目前CCIP仅看到一个用例：

*[Celsius](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/chainlink-announces-cross-chain-interoperability-protocol-ccip-301349599.html) 是领先的加密货币收益赚取平台，拥有近百万用户和超过 160 亿美元的锁定总价值，将整合 CCIP 以适应未来的平台，并实现跨多链 DeFi 生态系统的收益收获。 Celsius还在 [其后端系统中使用Chainlink Price Feeds](https://celsiusnetwork.medium.com/celsius-secures-backend-pricing-of-crypto-using-the-chainlink-a-major-leap-in-cefi-cd274efdc461) 来确定用户在存入抵押品时的借贷利率，从而帮助平台逐步去中心化。*

### 3.质押功能

Link2.0推出的权益质押功能，是2.0版经济模型的最重要组织部分，在发布之后，LINK也从$5反弹到了$9.2。

其质押围绕四大版块展开：

一是预言机网络进行质押。如果无法履行链上服务水平协议，则将扣除部分代币，这部分主要用于激励节点提供正确的对象，此条主要是为了进一步提升安全性。

二是社区成员和节点运营商等生态参与者，让更多人参与到社区中，同时提升网络去中心化水平，建立更好的机制。

三是鼓励长期质押。一开始主要是发放LINK奖励，之后，会从获得的用户服务费中拔出一部分作为奖励（这一点值得点赞！）

四是通过质押建立声誉系统，节点为自身服务质押多少代币成为一个重要外在指标，更多的质押，意味着更高价值的任务和更大的收入机会。

质押机制并非一步到位，而是逐步进行，2022年下半年将推出第一版，并不断添加新功能。

![官方公布的质押路线图](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eUzg9kcaKK1y5IM0KuRDD.png?height=447&width=843)

## 五、总述

link项目在过去几年里，持续稳步开发，已经成为预言机赛道无可争议的龙头，网络效应较为突出。

项目在过去专注长期价值，在经济模型等各方面发力不多，而新版本质押及跨链等新功能使项目从经济模型和叙事上都有了较大转变，中长期来看，属于较为确定的利好——因为大量的代币将进入质押系统，因此必然发生抛压减少的情况。

但是，由于LINK目前的实际收益极少，我们仍然强调，代币质押带来的中短期​市场供应的变化之后，仍然暂时是靠叙事驱动。应长期关注后续跨链协议及项目​营收等各方面情况。​

综上，我们给出**重点关注**评级!

title: 最宝贵的东西是感情
body:
**如果没有感情，那我们还有什么?**

说道亲情，源自于我们儿时的记忆，妈妈爸爸含辛茹苦把我们养大，那是父母的养育之恩，谁要忘了，那就不是人，不可以称之为人。我一生都不愿意与这等人渣为伍。最真挚的感情，那是孝道，不管父亲母亲如何说如何做，他们都是我们最亲的人。我们可以跟父母撒娇，跟父母耍脾气，跟父母争吵，这些都不能够损伤与父母的情感，但是，忘记了谁是父母，父母的养育，这是人生大不敬。

说道爱情，源自于我们对异性的感知，上天给了我们机缘，让我们有机会在茫茫人海中相识，相爱，相亲，最后结为夫妇，我们就负有责任，相濡以沫，相亲相爱，彼此忠诚，一生忠贞不渝，最后老去。谁在半路移情别恋，忘记诺言，撇弃糟糠，谁会最后品尝苦果。当然，有很多人任性，愿意尝试新的生活，期望或许会有改变，实际上，基本上没有改变多少，因为，太阳还是照样东方升起。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/sOyGJGROhG0M-rECJxd6p.png?height=474&width=776)

说道友情，源自于我们对周围社会的交往、融合和适应，我们的友情是我们一生营造的，很深很深的友情，出自于我们的真诚，我们内心的修炼，还有我们为他人付出的，并且不过于计较回报，这种比例越高，我们的道路就越宽。常言说道，每每遇到艰难困苦的时候，就出现贵人相助，就是这个道理。贵人总是青睐于那些看重友情的人。

感情无非由亲情、爱情和友情组成，情商是感情的深度和厚度。我们常常评价一个人情商如何如何，很难说清楚说的到底是哪一种情怀多哪一种情调少。但是，说一个人比较缺乏情商是人们对这个人的综合评价，不单单是说这个人那一个方面有缺陷。情商缺乏，情况都不太好。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GYXmEQ5G6XTKIml5ayao7.png?height=294&width=452)

一个比较阳光的人，一个热情洋溢的人，一个做事情坦坦荡荡的人，他的情商自然不会很低。情商比较高，当然会重视亲情、爱情和友情。我们要教育，我们有责任引导和暗示周围的人，特别是周围和我们比较亲密的人，用自己的言谈举止影响他人，学会感恩，学会爱人，学会真诚的与人相处。

最宝贵的不是金银，不是房子和车，不是所谓的身价，世界上最宝贵的是感情。

title: 重生之Across再爱我一次
body:
她是孙氏千金sunbeam，同时也是Across组织的忍者：杰克 sun，她绝顶聪明却因为被大佬和中佬背叛而死去。 
  
 当她再次睁开眼，她已不再是sunbeam，她成了性格孤僻，胆小懦弱的陈氏千金chainchen。 
  
 性格孤僻？胆小懦弱？这些跟她会沾得上边？她逆天改命，有推特，关注3000，当文豪，做kol，创社区，成为无数韭菜眼中的撸毛王。Across的社区大佬，性格冷漠，他狂妄，霸道，却唯独爱上了她。 
  
 他霸道的对她说：“女人，你注定是我的，你，逃不掉。”她冷道：“谁规定的？我的命运我决定，谁也别想干扰。 
  
 ”他冷漠霸道，却对她百般宠溺。她事事不怕，却对他无能为力。他们会发生什么故事呢？.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nqXiIxcfz9d4NOJg5ZmA7.png?height=700&width=2400)

\-远程过程调用是一种软件通信协议，一个程序可以使用该协议向位于网络上另一台计算机中的程序请求服务，而无需了解网络的详细信息。 RPC 用于调用远程系统上的其他进程，如本地系统。过程调用有时也称为函数调用或子例程调用。

\-RPC 使用客户端-服务器模型。请求程序是客户端，提供服务的程序是服务器。与本地过程调用一样，RPC 是一种同步操作，需要暂停请求程序，直到返回远程过程的结果。但是，使用共享相同地址空间的轻量级进程或线程可以同时执行多个 RPC。

\-接口定义语言（IDL）——用于描述软件组件的应用程序编程接口（API）的规范语言——通常用于远程过程调用软件。在这种情况下，IDL 在链路两端的机器之间提供了一座桥梁，这些机器可能使用不同的操作系统 (OS) 和计算机语言。

* 当使用 RPC 框架的程序语句被编译成可执行程序时，在编译的代码中包含一个存根，它充当远程过程代码的代表。当程序运行并发出过程调用时，存根接收请求并将其转发给本地计算机中的客户端运行时程序。第一次调用客户端存根时，它会联系名称服务器以确定服务器所在的传输地址。

\-客户端运行时程序知道如何寻址远程计算机和服务器应用程序，并通过网络发送请求远程过程的消息。类似地，服务器包括一个运行时程序和与远程过程本身交互的存根。响应请求协议以相同的方式返回。

以下是 RPC 为开发人员和应用程序管理人员提供的一些优势：

* 帮助客户端通过传统使用高级语言的过程调用与服务器进行通信。
* 可以在分布式环境中使用，也可以在本地环境中使用。
* 支持面向进程和面向线程的模型。
  \-对用户隐藏内部消息传递机制。
* 只需极少的努力即可重写和重新开发代码。
* 提供抽象，即网络通信的消息传递特性对用户隐藏。
* 省略许多协议层以提高性能。

另一方面，RPC 的一些缺点包括：

* 客户端和服务器各自的例程使用不同的执行环境，资源（例如-files）的使用也更加复杂。因此，RPC 系统并不总是适合传输大量数据。
  \-RPC 极易发生故障，因为它涉及通信系统、另一台机器和另一个进程。
  \-RPC没有统一的标准；它可以通过多种方式实现。
  \-RPC 只是基于交互的，因此在硬件架构方面它不提供任何灵活性。

title: A 14 day immersion to web3
body:
This page contains a two-week immersion program for people who are entirely new to web3. It consists of 14 discrete activities. Each activity should take less than an hour to complete. I recommend allocating about ~~$300~~ $200 (0.1 ETH) for learning purposes, though you certainly won’t need to spend all of it.

I’m trying to add a new lesson every couple of days and am currently at `11`/14 lessons. Please follow along and send to a friend!
