title: 一定要和优秀的人做朋友
body:
小维是一位集美貌与才华于一身的姑娘，年纪轻轻就做到公司的高层。我们相识于一次晚点的航班，基于既来之则安之的心理，我坐在那儿翻着手里的《雪国》，她却在嘈杂的候机室默默地背着什么，特别用心。

登机时，才发现我们的座位紧邻，她指着我手上的书说：“川端康成写了很多小说，这本是我最喜欢的，尤其是韩侍桁先生的这个译本，文笔极其优美。后来很多译本完全不能相提并论。”

我却摒弃了和她聊书的欲望，忍不住问她：“谈判一定很辛苦吧?”

她笑着递给我一张纸说：“我并不是去谈判，而是要去参加一个会，在背相关人员的资料。”

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/y9CA_cPrgvFBuArEqmdgE.png?height=312&width=484)

我一看，纸上密密地打印了很多个人信息——A君，某公司副总，爱好打网球，喜欢穿蓝色衣服;B小姐，某公司高管，能说一口流利的英文，爱好英文电影及小说;C先生，某公司董事长助理，爱好蹦极、登山，有仪器般精密的头脑，口才极佳……

她解释，这些都是很优秀的人，有的仅一面之交，有的并不认识，资料是业内朋友帮忙提供的，当然他们在业内比较有名气，所以得到这些资料并不难，难的是如何和他们交朋友。

“交朋友?”

“是啊，那些优秀的人大多很有教养，交流起来很舒服，看起来很容易结识，但当吃吃喝喝后想进一步了解时，却发现他们会有意无意地保持着距离，很微妙，看起来熟了，实则始终隔着一层面纱。

“如果细致地了解一个人之后，从生活细节入手，谈一些他们熟悉的背景与爱好，再交流起来就比较容易了，毕竟没有人能拒绝一个人的真诚。”

是啊，网上流行一句话：“越优秀的人越不愿意交朋友。”但谁又会拒绝与一个同样优秀又真诚的人做朋友呢?

有个很有意思的结论——你的水平，实际就是与你最亲近的5个朋友的平均水平。这个说法不算多准确，但结交良友，聚拢人脉，在一定意义上确实就是经营自己。孔子就提倡交朋友一定要结交比自己优秀的，哪怕只是某一方面的优秀。

一个人熬的时候，总有坚持不住的时候，在心里时时想着放纵一下，但一群人的坚持就不一样了，快要坚持不下时去看到身边的人还在拼搏，一咬牙一跺脚，绝不能放松!优秀的人身上最优秀的地方，就是比常人自律，而一群自律的人待在一起，已经抛开了普通人一大截了。

“蓬生麻中，不扶而直，白沙在涅，与之俱黑”说的就是环境影响，也是它所产生的最终结果。和优秀的人做朋友，再到自己也變得优秀，是一个历练的过程。

优秀的人好像一团光，吸引着身边的人往前走，因为在光明中待久了，自然而然就不想回到混沌中去了。

与心地善良的人交往，高尚的品格能相互促进;与勤奋的人在一起久了，你不会懒惰;与积极的人交朋友，你当然不会再消沉。

“择其善者而从之，其不善者而改之。”说的就是这个道理。

一个人能走多远，要看与谁同行。毕竟自身持续的努力加上合适的机遇，再加上朋友的影响与帮助，很容易造就一个人的成功。

title: Manually adding Ethereum token details to Metamask
body:
Metamask is the veritable Swiss army-knife of the Ethereum ecosystem, cementing its place as the most popular wallet interface in crypto in recent years. Despite this, the app still lacks some basic features including the ability to display ethereum tokens (aka ERC-20 tokens) by default.

For newer users in particular this is often cause for confusion - as evidenced by the amount of posts on r/ethereumnoobies regarding tokens the user fears they have lost.

Given the frequency of such posts, I have created this guide to obviate the need to rehash the same information for each such post. 

Before we get to that, here’s a brief summary of Metamask for those less familiar with the app.

**A Metamask refresher**

Metamask’s wallet interface for Ethereum based protocols\* is available as a browser extension on Chrome, Brave, Firefox & Edge. There is also a Metamask mobile app, though for the purpose of this guide instructions will focus on the browser version.

For optimal security, each Metamask installation should be initiated via the app’s website at metamask_io - as opposed to searching for Metamask in Google’s store due to instances where phishing versions of Metamask have been carelessly listed by Google.

I also recommend using a hardware device (HD) such as a Grid+ or Ledger Nano with Metamask. This provides optimal security by encrypting your wallet’s private key and using two factor authentication where you the user respond to information using both Metamask’s and your HD device’s screen and keys.

You can also import your wallet’s private key directly into Metamask though this is not recommended due to the possible presence of malware on your PC capable of phishing this information to access to your wallet.

**Adding tokens to Metamask’s list**

To the main task - of adding tokens that do not appear in Metamask’s token list. 

Under “Assets” refer to the section displaying ETH in your wallet in the app. Beneath this, you will see the following text:

*“Don’t see your token? Refresh list or import tokens.”*

If clicking “Refresh” fails to reveal your token, entering “Import Tokens” and “Search” sometimes reveals common tokens like $USDC that when clicked will be added to the list. Otherwise you will need to click “Custom Token” and enter a token’s details on the following page.

This information can typically be obtained via Etherscan_io. Entering the token’s initials (eg, “UNI” for Uniswap) in the website’s main search panel will generate a list of options with the relevant token often appearing in the top results.

Otherwise, providing the full name of the token may be required before you can locate the respective page. Note: be wary of fake versions of a token that use the same name and symbol when conducting this search - by noting if there is a blue check mark next to “token summary” and observing if the token’s symbol is displayed.

When you have located the token you are looking for on Etherscan, copy text next to “Contract” and paste this information into Metamask the “Token Contract Address” pane on the respective page. The other two fields will typically auto-populate following this; if not, return to Etherscan and take note of these details to enter manually as above.

Finally, click “Add Custom Token” and you will hopefully see this token & the correct balance in your wallet in Metamask.

\*These instructions refer to tokens on Ethereum’s main chain although similar procedures apply for Ethereum’s layer two solutions (including Arbitrum and Optimism); Ethereum’s side-chains (including Gnosis & Polygon) and protocols like Avalanche using the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) standard.

title: Day 12: Redeem your skills on RabbitHole and build a web3 resume
body:
> **CORE CONCEPTS**
>
> *We’ve already introduced [the concept of composability](https://mirror.xyz/cerv1.eth/s1UwRJxhTi76PdFlS6hqN8kHqe9oVImbGlTtzE_IHFQ) -- that is, the power to use open data and source code to build new applications on top of existing ones. The same features that make it easy to follow a user’s activity on the blockchain make it possible to verify one’s knowledge or mastery of a topic. Today, we’ll try out one of the first applications that capitalizes on the ability to view a user’s on-chain skills progression: RabbitHole.*

### The traditional resume vs the on-chain resume

A resume is a document that provides an overview of your professional qualifications, including relevant work experience, skills, education, and accomplishments. Many professionals spend hours formatting and word-smithing their resumes.

A traditional resume is a heavily curated, one-page synthesis of all the experiences and skills you feel are most relevant and attractive to an employer. Although few employers crosscheck the truthfulness of what’s on your resume, there’s an implicit honor code that anything you put on it should be verifiable.

The idea of an “on-chain resume” is nascent but stands to eliminate much of the curation and verification challenge. You can prove that you attended certain learning events through your POAPs. You can demonstrate that you are capable of performing certain tasks by sharing your transaction history. You can back up your claim to be an active member of a DAO via your voting records on Snapshot. 

These are just a few obvious examples; much more is possible. E. Glen Weyl, Puja Ohlhaver, and Vitalik Buterin recently released [a paper](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=4105763) about non-transferable “soulbound” tokens representing the commitments, credentials, and affiliations of an individual.

Regardless of the mechanism, as more work and social activity start happening on-chain, there will likely be greater value afforded to on-chain credentials.

### What is RabbitHole?

[RabbitHole](https://rabbithole.gg/) is one of the first projects to explore these concepts. From their homepage:

> *We believe web3 fundamentally reshapes the future of work and talent organization. By curating an on-chain graph of a user’s prior achievements, RabbitHole is creating the on-chain resume for the future of work.*

RabbitHole currently has two credentialing tracks for users: Skills and Quests.

1. **Skills**: A Skill is a collection of 3-4 discrete on-chain tasks that you complete to boost your web3 knowledge in a given domain (eg, DAOs). When you “redeem” a skill, RabbitHole verifies your on-chain transaction history.
2. **Quests**: A Quest is a time-bound challenge where you learn how to use a decentralized app, and earn tokens based on your on-chain activity. The proof that you completed a Quest on time is also verified permissionlessly on-chain.

RabbitHole’s Quests are an example of another nascent concept called “learn-to-earn” in which you earn rewards for learning how to use a new product or feature. 

Imagine Google paying you a small amount of money to learn how to use its [Advanced Search](https://www.google.com/advanced_search) commands. Or the knowledge management app Notion giving you a reward for [hosting a page on a custom domain](https://geekflare.com/notion-custom-domain/).

Regardless of whether you want to learn-to-earn or just learn, RabbitHole is a great resource for newcomers to explore different projects and gain exposure to the type of work that is moving on-chain.

In fact, several of your recent actions have already qualified you to redeem Skills on RabbitHole. Let’s check it out.

### Redeeming Skills on RabbitHole

Start by going to the RabbitHole homepage in your MetaMask enabled browser: [rabbithole.gg](https://rabbithole.gg/). Click the button to **Use RabbitHole.**

![The RabbitHole landing page](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7ALUZGFBCoXSRb-MgdmZA.png?height=1486&width=2708)

As usual, you will be prompted to **Connect Your Wallet** and sign the transaction on MetaMask. After doing so, the page should update showing that your wallet is connected.

![Connect to the RabbitHole dapp](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aIhppXpZSQEbjZP6B6z4n.png?height=1514&width=2682)

Sometimes I find the RabbitHole site needs to be refreshed in order to establish a wallet connection. If you don’t see your wallet connected, just refresh your browser and hopefully it will update. If not, try re-connecting.

Once you’re connected, you will see a simple dashboard for Skills and Quests. The Skills page currently includes three credential tracks: NFTs, DeFi, and DAOs. Each skillset includes a tracker of how many on-chain tasks you’ve completed.

Your dashboard should appear similar to the one below -- with a 0/3 or 0/4 tasks displayed for each skillset. 

We’ll start by scrolling down to **Intro to DAOs** and clicking that button.

![RabbitHole has various tasks to complete to prove Skills](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MHxqBXkhbwCyv_vJQx09R.png?height=1526&width=2714)

Currently, there are three DAOs Skills available. If you completed the [Day 9 activity](https://mirror.xyz/cerv1.eth/gqdf7YDb6AR-torLOUFPODYMlOD3vMDcDE41xpd0q1E) by voting on Snapshot, then you should be eligible to redeem this task.

If you haven’t voted on Snapshot yet, you can learn more about the process by clicking on the **Details** button or you can click **Start** and go directly to the Snapshot page to see if you are eligible for any current votes. 

If you have voted before, then instead of seeing a “Not Started” indicator, you should see a button prompting you to **Redeem** your skill. \[Unfortunately I don’t have a screenshot of the **Redeem** button turning on.\] If you’ve performed a vote, but don’t see an option to **Redeem**, trying refreshing your browser. 

![Intro to DAOs includes a redemption for voting on Snapshot](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kOlUkK1xpUZtKwMC2LgMH.png?height=1494&width=2668)

After clicking the **Redeem** button, the dashboard updates to show my task is complete. (Again, sometimes you need to refresh the page in your browser to trigger the update.)

![After refreshing, it shows I have completed on DAO task](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KJ6jv0wlFKsKxchJ9JmQu.png?height=1440&width=2616)

Even if you haven’t been able to vote on Snapshot yet, there’s another Skill you should be eligible for if you completed [Day 11](https://mirror.xyz/cerv1.eth/mibs8dYHRL3eWCtxunMNrTkbGa3ZNuy3oE_9bxL_oRg), Staking Ethereum on Lido.

Go back to the all Skills dashboard and click on the **Intro to DeFi** track. It should show that you are eligible to redeem the first of four tasks: Stake ETH on Lido.

Hopefully the redemption works and now you are well on your way to building a basic set of verifiable web3 skills!

![You can also redeem the Stake ETH on Lido task in Intro to Defi](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_WmQdZg69vPrKUJ9IzGFi.png?height=1448&width=2270)

### Final thoughts

RabbitHole is a great learning resource for beginners. If you want to go deeper, you should check their website often or follow their socials to learn about new Skills and especially Quest opportunities. And, because its aimed at beginners, each activity usually has a good write-up and tutorial for how to earn the Skill or complete the Quest. 

I do have a few gripes with RabbitHole, though. First, the website is not super-responsive and doesn’t always capture all the tasks you’ve completed. (The proof is still there, immutably captured on the blockchain; it’s just their backend or integrations with other protocols aren’t updating.)

More importantly, some of the tasks require spending a lot of gas. The remaining DeFi activities in particular are not very friendly for newcomers. We already spent about $12 in gas to Stake ETH. More advanced tasks like lending and borrowing on a DeFi site like [Aave](https://aave.com/) will cost you much more than that. In order to rationalize such gas fees, you’d need to be moving several thousands of dollars worth of ETH per transaction -- something newcomers should probably not be doing. Instead, I think RabbitHole should move its **Intro to DeFi** task redemptions onto another chain like Polygon, where gas fees are much lower and it feels more affordable to experiment with different types of transactions. 

Hopefully, RabbitHole will continue to expand its offerings and make learn-to-earn more accessible to newcomers. 

### Further reading:

[https://rabbithole.mirror.xyz/](https://rabbithole.mirror.xyz/)

[https://collectiveshift.io/tutorial/rabbithole-guide/](https://collectiveshift.io/tutorial/rabbithole-guide/)

title: 暖的白咖啡
body:
独爱咖啡，它温暖的香甜的味道，总是让我着迷。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VeNgJeUbJocI8LWx1tkMQ.png?height=270&width=499)

可是，事物总有两个面，伴着这温暖香甜的，就是脑神经的高度清晰，最怕的，是夜深了也无法入睡。而我呢，总是在喝完咖啡之后的十二小时之后，效果才突显。唉!午后暖暖的咖啡，是要到夜深人静的时候才来精神!所以每每，看着咖啡，馋虫蠢蠢欲动，但是总是不太敢轻易尝试。总不能一大早就喝咖啡吧!

最近迷上了马来西亚的白咖啡，它醇香的味道令人着迷。厚而醇的香味，堪比茶叶中的普洱，是老派绅士才有的品质和色泽。唉!不管了!人生谁不曾放任自己一把呢!谁让自己如此酷爱呢!不管时间了，想起来馋了就冲上一杯，尽享美滋美味。嗬!可是好了，睡眠也没质量了，晨昏颠倒不说，额头边角长出了细密的小疙瘩……放任的代价，还是蛮高的。汗呢!

想起来喜欢的事物，都不是可以由着自己的性子来。就像这白咖啡，不能喜了就一口喝太多了。也像那人与人之间的交际，并非热就一头热，好就好成一团。老人家有句话叫做“过犹不及”，事情做得过头，和做得不够一样，都是不合适的。这就考验人的社交智慧了。怎么能够做到，做一个恰到好处的人，做一些恰如其分的事，怎么都感觉挺难的呢!也许修炼不够，也许还缺乏养成，那么，只好慢慢让自己变得更好吧!

怎么都很难让自己成为一个有城府的人。这和年龄有关系，但是也不是仅此而已。一个人随着年龄增长，会变得越来越成熟，也会增加社交的城府。但是，这应该与每个人的性格关系更大一些。性格外向的人，城府相对少些，愿意向外界暴露自己更多的内心喜好，内向的人，那么，喜怒哀乐就藏得深一些，不容易被外界看到内心真实的东西，显得更神秘。

但是，很难说，外向还是内向更好一些。也很难以评价，城府深的人适合生存，还是城府浅的人，更易获得朋友。藏得深了，把自己包起来，是怕自己受到伤害，但是会失去朋友更多了解你的机会，也把朋友挡在了心门之外。而把自己内心和盘托出的人，当然有朋友的交心，有惺惺相惜。但是，利剑可是到处都有，四面八方，也有暗箭伤人，置暴露在外的你，赤裸裸的你，于暗箭之下。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6dopHFMH4WXqUiCYOYLCm.png?height=255&width=390)

做人真的很难。你不知道哪个朋友喜欢什么样的你，也不知道什么样的你会让朋友喜欢，什么样会得罪朋友。更有时候，躺着中枪，无意说出的话，也会惹了对号入座的人不开心不高兴。那可真是冤大头呢!可是这世界，就有那么些总是喜欢盯着别人比照自己的人，怎么都觉得处处不如别人，没有人家那么好，看着别人好就生气。只要看见了人家比它好的，就是得罪了这种人。牢骚满腹空断肠的，好像就是这种苦大仇深的人，只要比他好的，就是他的仇人一样。还真拿这种人没办法。惹不起躲得起，只好躲开满大街咬人的疯狗。

既然怎么样都不会讨所有人欢心，不如就讨自己欢心好了。做一个真实的自己，放任自己，就像任意的喝所喜欢的白咖啡。但是，也就是这个结果，满脸的痘痘。也不算太好。怎么做人，都是挺为难啊!

其实，三生有幸啊，既然做了朋友，何必伪装，何必勉为其难呢!不要挑剔朋友的细节了，如果不是大是大非，美一点丑一点没关系，好一点差一点也没多大问题的。更不必让友情变得剑拔弩张。以暖的心去看每一个人，心里会好受很多。就像喝着的白咖啡，尽享那友情的醇厚味道，而不必勉强太多。

不必在别扭和尴尬的社交中，在乎太多。介意多了，真的不如不要了朋友，还更省心得多。但是，我们都有了这么多的友情，何不以欣赏之心，互相爱护和温暖呢?在这凉薄的世间，我们需要白咖啡，需要彼此温暖的友情。

title: 与阿E的故事
body:
阿 E明天就要结婚了。 前些天朋友圈空间疯传着结婚照，我窝在被窝里直接回复：大晚上的晒结婚照，还让不让人睡了!

阿 E，金融男，校友。黑黑的，稍微胖。办事利索，稳，准，狠。头脑发达，精通历史地理，一副领导人的架势。是的，是团支书，是班长。

就连跟阿 E的认识都是不可思议的。2012年春，校园的十佳歌手比赛如火如荼地进行着，舞台正对的自习室都被吵得没人了。最后只剩下我和另一个人，谁也不认识谁。那个人就是阿E。我后来索性不看书了直接坐在窗户边上开始俯视比赛。这时阿E走过来也开始看，于是开始聊天，开始聊舞台，开始聊歌手。 你用手机拍了几张清晰的比赛照片，承诺回头传给我。

是的，于是我认识了你，阿E。

后来得知歌手比赛的第二天是专接本的考试。你那晚学到了凌晨两点。

你如约把照片传给了我。再次见到你的时候，是你拿着录取通知书在燕大小吃街请我吃驴肉火锅。

然后就是初秋的季节。暑假开学，十一来临。我一个人去了北京。通过你，我认识了你的好基友阿C。阿 C是北京一名牌大学的才子。是的，在你眼里他琴棋书画样样精通，在我眼里，典型的执着风趣闷骚摩羯男。下火车，转地铁，五道口， 阿C穿着一件格子衬衫在不远处挥手。阳光，腼腆是我对 阿C的第一印象。

阿C带我去看定好的住所。一路上导游般地穿过了好几所大学。聊大学，聊建筑，聊梁思成。是的，因为 阿C是学建筑的。我不懂建筑啊，于是我就由梁思成马上转到了林徽因，然后变成了徐志摩，陆小曼。最后还提到了韩寒，因为那段时间韩寒的绯闻闹得沸沸扬扬。我只记得 阿C最后说了一句话我至今记忆犹新：像他这样的名人才子也只有绿叶才能更衬托出他们的美。

十月一过完返回学校临走前 阿C带我去前门吃卤煮火烧。那是我第一次吃，吃得很匆忙，赶火车也很匆忙。

很快到了十一月份初，招聘会一个接一个，我却决定要去香山看红叶。临走前你冒雨送我到车站。我一个人爬了香山，夜游了后海，吃了好多小吃，我拍照传给你，你说佩服我的洒脱，又觉得我像疯子。

十一月份中旬， 阿C来岛上找你，你叫上我一起去火车站接阿C。当时阿C背着个双肩包从出站口出来，你们俩激动得直接在火车站来了个大大的拥抱，留下我一个人在一旁尴尬。

第二天大早晨五点多，你们俩在海边激动地打电话说看到日出了。让我赶紧过去。我自然没赶过去。后来，我们仨冒着刺骨的风去爬了山海关，看到了毛泽东提笔的：不到长城非好汉。还一起在长城脚下合了影： 你严肃， 阿C腼腆，而我笑得灿烂。

长城围起来的里面是一个湖，湖里的水都结冰了。我们仨就开始捡石头往冰上砸!大的小的，比赛谁砸开的冰大，谁砸得溅起来的水花大。整个湖面上都是我们的呼喊声。

第二个早晨， 怪楼进发。你发挥你的聪明才智带领我们黑灯瞎火地钻地洞走后门逃票成功。从楼底爬到楼顶。然后就是坐车返回，下车，吃饺子，秦皇求仙入海处。一路上我都在听你们俩聊历史，聊战争，聊皇帝。我们玩得很开心。

第三个早晨，据说阿C一大早嚷嚷着要你带他去本校见建筑系老师，要交流，要学习。这天也是我正式参加招聘会，踩着八厘米的恨天高，穿着西服，拿着一摞简历和证书，挤在人群中。你们俩从不远处走过来微笑着给我打招呼，要我加油，给我鼓励。我就感到好温暖。 ……

过完年，就春暖花开了。我那时回家正忙着准备选调生考试。傍晚时候，手里还攥着申论的真题，烦心地浏览着大篇大篇的文字，意外地接到了你跟阿C的电话。你们说你俩在北京一起吃饭呢，就是突然想起我了就给我打个电话，问我准备得怎么样了。我就忽然好感动。

时间过得飞快，先是我毕业了。你跟阿C还继续着你们的最后一年的逍遥的大学生活。临走前我们一起吃了饭，我买了金鱼送给你，你后来说金鱼被养死了只剩下了鱼缸。

临走前去北京找阿C，他正忙着论文和保研。但还是陪我逛了一下午北大。那时候，正是燥热的七月，未名湖畔的水都感觉在蒸发。我跟阿C去教室外头听课，去体育馆拳击，去小山树下避雨。听他聊建筑，聊朋友，聊北京……之后的之后就是阿C顺利地被保研，继续他的大学生活。而我有好几次去北京由于各种原因没再见过阿C。

再次见到你是毕业后第二年的夏天。河北正值闷热的季节。你像快毕业那年一样给我报了徒步大会的名，是的，我要回岛上跟你一起参加徒步。于是坐了一夜的火车去秦皇岛，临下火车前还画了个淡妆。你在火车站一看到我就说我变漂亮了啊，化妆后变化不小。我心里默念：混蛋，会不会说话啊。

那天天公不作美，从阴天到小雨最后到大雨。徒步大会照常进行，我们就冒着雨跟着一群人从森林公园为起点徒步徒步徒步，走了大半个秦皇岛。衣服湿了，鞋子湿了，头发开始滴水，最后就是淋雨。后来，你拿着我跟你的徒步证书在一群人后面排队等着盖章，我看到雨越下越大，雨滴从伞上滑落，然后滴在你的头发上，脖子上，衣服上，你的衣服全湿透了。我在后面站着，鼻子酸酸的，心里暖暖的。

第二天，天气放晴。晚上十一点的火车。临走前你请我吃比尔森，去图书室，逛小吃街，吃臭豆腐，霞姐烤冷面。夏天岛上的夜晚清爽，干净。然后就是你骑着单车带着我从燕大一直到北戴河，吹了一晚的风，看了一路的风景。

……

然后你毕业了。回到了你的家乡。

我们后来的对话信息大抵就变成了类似这样：

\---------------------------

—把这段话翻译成英语，明天给我

—今天忙啊 明天给

\---------------------------

—最近开始做生意了，上QQ看我进的货

—什么生意

—卖包，送货上门(图片)，最下面那个是双肩，你觉得我前景怎么样

—不断努力的话会不错

\---------------------------

—最近销量怎么样啊? ——不怎么样，我打算做保险了。——加油。

\---------------------------

——你怎么弄了个狗狗的头像 ——那不是你吗?——……

\---------------------------

——“魏小强，加油”(我的说说)——你好，魏小强(语音)

\---------------------------

——过段时间去北京玩，可能带俩妞儿——是吗?是漂亮的妞儿不

\---------------------------

——(发型图片)——发型咋这样了?——我在走流氓路线——……

\---------------------------

——昨天在石家庄参加考试，然后去北京和同学小聚了一下。——我五一刚去了北京，也不通知我，我去看大熊猫了。

\---------------------------

——我想改名，给我取个名字吧。——魏皓茗怎么样?取明眸皓齿之意，很大气，意境也很美。——男孩子的名字啊，我要淑女一点的。

\---------------------------

——(唱歌语音)/唱的怎么样——我去——怎么着——听不清打字吧——……尼妹

\---------------------------

——特想回秦皇岛看看去。——过俩月吧，等我有钱了一起去(6.27)

\---------------------------

——我心情糟透了——(语音)/(语音)/(语音)——听不清，打字——我又换工作了，在银行工作——……

\---------------------------

——什么时候结婚?——明年吧，你呢相亲了吗——相了

\---------------------------

——(语音)——打字，听不清——好累呀好累呀——不懂你们金融

\---------------------------

——(书法图片)/有点进步吗?——字体变大了——我说的是不是好看一点了比以前。我的字老是被鄙视。

\---------------------------

——(图片)/美不美——好看 女神范———谢谢思密达!

\---------------------------

——啥时候结婚，还说结婚前找你聚聚

——1月3号的婚礼，没时间啦，哈哈哈

\---------------------------

我也以为没时间了，但是我还是找了你一次，就前不久。又是一夜的火车。你看到我来到唐山的信息是下午五点左右。我说我在八方商城，你说三十分钟到。我站在公路旁的地下通道口等你，你从我身后拍我肩膀，然后跳到我面前，你笑得合不拢嘴，而我看到你后就控制不住地开始哭，最后哭到说不出话。你木木地现在前面说见到我至于这么激动吗。最后你索性走在前面不说话，我在后面继续擦眼泪。你拿着两袋特产递给我，我说我什么也没带，你说你人来了还不行吗。

你带我去南湖，从头走到尾。湖边没有风，却异常冷。湖里的水都结冰了，湖面上杂草斜倒在冰上。我问你工作怎么样了，你说基本上稳定了。我问你为什么，你可是一直都在换工作，一直都在尝试。你说马上就要结婚，结了婚，就有了家，就都稳定了。

然后就去万达吃水煮鱼。路上你问我相亲得怎么样了，我说不怎么样。心里其实反反复复在想：我何止又是没有爱过，人渣算吗?喜欢我的人还不都又喜欢了别人，他们本来就没那么喜欢我。我喜欢的?，后知后觉，错过了，要么已经结婚了，要么连面都没见!呵呵，网恋也算吗?怎么办?怎么办。很多时候都觉得自己是不是要孤独终老了。

吃水煮鱼，我喝了半瓶酒。最后脸开始发红。然后在十字路口道别。临走前，我问你你结婚邀请我吗，你说，你觉得呢。我说应该不会，因为我已经来过了。

……

我送你的鱼缸毕业时候已经丢了吧?

我们三人在山海关的合影你现在还留着吗?

对了，你送我的花生酥糖还没吃完呢。

你知道的哦，我不爱你。我们之间没有暧昧，没有矫情。但我们的关系，没有比好朋友少一点儿，也不比所谓的知己多一点儿。仅有的是，纯粹，真诚，情谊。

如果一定要说遗憾的话，也许是我毕业时欠你的一个拥抱，抑或是一次逃课陪你去动物园看小动物的应答，又或者是徒步大会那次多请一天假留下来陪你爬一次祖山的承诺。

谢谢你给了我青色欲滴的回忆。结婚快乐!

title: 最纯不过同学情
body:
也许在天之涯，也许在海之角。也许在同城中，也许在他乡地。若许年，可曾变?一声问候，还好吗?我的老同学?人生的情感，亲情、友情、爱情，其中友情中，最纯不过同学情。人的一生中，同学情，始终伴随着终生，是一生中的财富，是每个人经过身心交流、情感交融得来的情义……

同学情至纯至真，像玉壶冰心，似银色月光，让人心透明，让人生温馨 ; 像一杯白开水那样平淡无奇，它没有茶叶那样丰富的内涵，也没有咖啡那样浓烈的芳香，但它却透着清新、质朴、坦荡与真实，一遍遍地温热着我的心……也没有名利的杂质，没有物欲的浊流，只有共同走过的一段黄金岁月。

小学同学两小无猜，青梅竹马。虽有同桌的你，课桌中间画“三八线”，偶尔吵吵闹闹;虽有竞争对手，暗自较劲，但一旦面临上初中第一次分别，女同学眼泪汪汪，男同学一夜长大，惜别，纯净了最初的同学情。

初中高中，从豆蔻年华到花季雨季，恰同学少年，一同飞扬青春的旋律，一同经历成长的烦恼，一同承受考试的压力，一同走过叛逆的日子。做人的基石深深埋下，友谊的种子悄悄萌芽，还有慢慢长大的滋味共同品尝。一起参加的18岁成人仪式，成了同学们告别幼稚、走向成熟，扬起风帆、破浪前行的集体仪式，像一杯清醇的酒，历久弥香。

毕业后10年、20年……同学聚会成了人生的盛宴。什么都可推辞，就是同学聚会不能不参加。乍一看，人世沧桑刻在脸上，3分钟过后尽开颜。不叫官职，无论长幼，直呼其名。还是学童时的模样，还是那时的倔脾气。回首望，人间冷暖，世态炎凉，官场风云，商海沉浮，甜酸苦辣，悲欢离合，让人感觉塌实的、难以割舍的，还是浓浓的同学情。

当然，人生也不能尽如人意。逆境中，同学是一把火，燃烧你的激情，教你屡败屡战，永不放弃;顺境里，同学是一块冰，劝你头脑别发热，宠辱不惊。风雨中，同学是相携相扶的臂膀，是遮风挡雨的那把伞;阳光里，同学是蓝天上飘荡的白云，是雨后的那道彩虹。

同学相聚，一杯清茶、一次握手、一阵感叹，无拘无束、自由自在，彼此间没有高低贵贱、没有阿谀奉承、没有虚伪做作、没有勾心斗角，有的只是心灵与心灵共鸣的感动。时间可以更改我们的容颜，却无法改变我们同学之间的纯真友情，那浓浓的友情如同汩汩暖流在我们的心间流淌。虽然我们为生活而奔波，为事业而忙碌，但我们知道，我们永远是同学。无论岁月如何改变，不变的是我们永远纯真的同学情!

title: 终于释怀的一件小事儿
body:
上班之后，放假是个奢侈品，但凡有个一天半天的假，行程都会被安排的丰富多彩。可我这个在事业单位上班的小学老师，假多的却不知道到要怎么消遣了。

我不是一个特别会自娱自乐的人，想要来一场一个人的旅行，方向感太差，一个人宅在家里，又怕辜负大好时光。所以，别人一到放假就兴奋，而我，一到放假，把觉补够后就迷茫。眼看着元旦要来了，心里正想着该如何是好，同学佳微信问我，元旦去爬Wudang Mountain可好。

不用愁假期没地方耍了，哈哈!我果断回复：“好!”然后带着小小的兴奋静待元旦到来。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/So4jkkrdKe-PCjcBPRkQd.png?height=243&width=535)

元旦前三天，老妈来电话问放假回不回家，我回复，不回家，要去爬武当山。

元旦前两天，同学聪来电话问放假做什么，要不要一起聚聚，我回复，改次吧，要去爬武当山。

元旦前一天，送走心心念念盼假期的学生们，送走心心念念盼假期的同事们，拿起手机给佳打电话，商定明天出发的时间，不巧她电话正在通话中，再打无人接听。我想现在只能等她回电了。结果，等到我进入梦乡的前一秒，电话也没有响起过。她可能是有急事要处理，明天不去爬山了吧。我这么想着。

新年的第一天，我睡到很晚，直到同学婷的电话打来，问我在做什么，我说还在睡觉。她还在上班，邀我去她的店里玩。我起床收拾完毕，就出门，直奔婷婷的店，和他们一起，聊天、吃零食，呆了整整一个下午，偶尔空闲玩玩手机，看看朋友圈有什么新动态，却无意发现佳上传的游玩照片。她还是去爬武当了，只不过同伴是另一个我不认识的女孩子。心中顿时有些失落，还夹杂着生气。

失落，是因为高中时我们曾是那么要好的同班同学，同出同入，无话不说，虽然大学几年不在一起，联系也比较少，但我以为那份情谊还在那里。现在看来，只是我以为还在那里，或者说，我的还在那里，而她，却不是我能断定的，因为我已经是可以轻易被替换掉的边缘人了。或许，我们的约定，她都没记在心上吧。

我生气，是因为不喜欢被人放鸽子，不喜欢随意毁约的人，无论对普通朋友还是要好的朋友，这是基本的相处礼仪之道。

人都如此，经得起一般人的背叛出卖，却经不起亲近的人的出尔反尔。 最终，我也没有很失落，很生气。或许是因为，对我对她而言，我们都没有视对方为十分十分重要的人。

此事就此告一段落。假期结束，我们各自忙碌。有空看看朋友圈，看到佳发表的心情，貌似心情不佳，是被什么事情困扰了吧。尽管如此，我还是一副冷眼旁观的态度，既然她把我划为边缘人，我也无需雪中送炭。这样僵持几日，看她动态，貌似情况一天比一天差，我也懒得去计较当初她带给我的那一点点失落和情绪，敲个电话过去一问究竟，才知道他们部门被解散，要被分到别的部门去，结果还没下来，所以心里焦躁。听到这里，我也算松了一口气，说了一些宽慰的话，聊了些其它，就挂电话，元旦爬武当的事，我只字未提，放下了。

时间会冲淡不值得的记忆，留下的才是值得珍惜的。我们的从前已经被冲散在记忆的河流了。

body:
> 本文由[YuDAO](https://discord.gg/YuDAO)出品，作者：@lanli|蓝犁  @tnkrxyz
>
> 欢迎加入YuDAO，纯正Web3社区，共建共享共有。

### 本文主要回答的问题

* Chainlink所处赛道和赛道价值
* Chainlink的赛道地位、护城河以及主要指标
* 生态以及生态价值
* 收入、成本、估值、代币以及投资建议

## 一、Chainlink基本情况及赛道分析

Chinalink是一个去中心化预言机，是目前使用最为广泛的预言机。项目始于2014年，2017年募资3200万美元，发售3.5亿代币。

代币总量10亿，已流通4.6亿，当前（2022年6月9日）价格$9.28，总市值排名21，历史最高为$52.7，目前-82%。

Chainlink在这个牛市里表现不佳，5/19之前价格ATH达到 52，之后未恢复ATH，而目前更是只有ATH的12%(6.4)；对比之下，ETH在11月再次达到ATH，而目前价格是5/19之前高点的是ATH的42%, uni是5/19 ATH的11%，DPI (defi 蓝筹，不包括Link)是ATH的14%。

![Link走势图](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/owylLK9ZvwtPXJJTJ2iU5.png?height=1056&width=1297)

可以说，Link在本次牛市中和defi蓝筹涨跌幅差不多，都跑输以太。

区块链这个周期到了今天，处于一个市场证伪的阶段。整体上区块链有四个高潜力应用：价值存储、defi (金融）、nft、Gamefi。

——其中价值存储共识最强，如比特币被认为对应法币来讲，是最为可靠的资产，其价值叙事尽管 价格波动剧烈，但已经得到最为广泛的认可。

——NFT在Yuga制造的大FOMO之后，迎来了一波由蓝筹带动的下跌，整个市场的成交金额只有高峰期的几十分之一。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0__gDAqKMiTRfQt_phxbE.png?height=427&width=1174)

——GameFI领域，P2E、X2E等模式被广泛质疑，gamefi正陷入低潮。

——DeFI领域本就在牛市后半段出现剧烈下跌，而在Luna崩盘之后，市场怀疑加剧，TVL从最高点的186b降低到83b，跌幅超过50%。

Defi是区块链最核心的应用，而defi今天颓势的核心原因之一就是defi的外部性不够—— 有点像一个游乐场，在内部空转。未来的defi以至于整个web3，必须具备外部性。而Chinalink就是web3和外部链接的一个重要接口。

Chainlink是预言机赛道的龙头，有着最为庞大的生态，其采取的开源开发模式，使得项目在数据提供商、节点运营商、智能合约开发者、研究者、安全审计人员等全方面获得较快扩张。

Chainlink目前已经发展成为已发展成为每个新兴智能合约垂直领域使用最广泛的去中心化预言机解决方案，包括DeFi、保险、游戏、NFT等。

目前官方白皮书已经进入2.0时代，在安全性、扩展性、质押机制等方面有全方位的更新，用官方的说法是“重新定义去中心化预言机网络的功能”。

具体可以观看官方提供的视频，自带简中字幕：

[https://youtu.be/7Ow8uN1TmxA](https://youtu.be/7Ow8uN1TmxA)

对于普通投资者来说，作为头部的预言机，其生态究竟如何？未来能有怎样的发展？持有代币可以有何种赋能等等是更加关心的问题。

但让我们从专业一点的内容开始，更有利于科学地决策。

## 二、安全性分析

作为预言机，在去中心化金融等诸多场景中，扮演着极为重要的角色。试想一下，如果多个预言机给数字货币或NFT借贷平台报出错误的价格，则立即会导致用户资产和交易受到重大损失。因此，安全性是预言机的生命线。

首先来看去中心化程度， Link的节点选取有Permission，每个价格大约有21-30个节点形成一个DON做报价。采用双层验证机制，DON如果多数串谋则任何一个DON的节点都可以举报给“二层裁决”，二层裁决由Aave等Link的用户组成，有比较强的动机不作恶。这是2.0更新中的重要内容，感兴趣深入研究的读者可以参阅这篇[官方文档](https://blog.chain.link/explicit-staking-in-chainlink-2-0/)。

其原理是在“加密经济学”的基础上构建信任关系，类似于对比特币发动51%攻击所付出的经济代价如果高于所能获得的利益，则没有足够动机发动51%攻击。

但是对于各个节点构建起来的安全性，也有一些质疑的声音，如[《Chainlink 2.0 白皮书问题出在哪？》](https://www.jinse.com/blockchain/1081588.html)等。

据官方说法，其运作方式大致包括：节点会有staking在节点里做质押，如果出现数据造假，导致了DeFi项目受损，质押在智能合约里面的这些币将全都要被罚掉。节点确实由Chainlink选择，有一定中心化，但是对节点的要求非常高，官方表示之后在节点的选取上去中心化程度会更高，不会再有类似白名单制的方式，每个节点获取多少工作量，能给多少项目喂价，都取决于它以往的历史工作记录。

Chainlink 2.0白皮书中引入了“超线性权益质押”（super-linear staking）的概念，这在现有的权益质押模式上往前迈出了一大步。超线性权益质押要求攻击者的资金量必须超过所有预言机节点保证金总和的二次方才能成功入侵DONs。DONs拥有独特的集中报警器系统（alerter system）和双层裁决系统（two-tier adjudication system），为用户提供更大的加密经济安全保障，可以抵御其他系统无法抵御的猛烈攻击。

在极少数情况下，由一级预言机网络生成的预言机报告引发争议，由下面进一步描述的看门狗/警报机制触发，争议将由速度较慢的二级委员会解决，该委员会由成百上千的独立 Chainlink 用户，例如 Aave、Synthetix、Compound 等。 如果曾经产生争议，这些用户将使用 DECO 提供 零知识证明 来自一个或多个数据提供者的基于 DECO 提供高效、低成本、防篡改的仲裁，让二线参与方在不接触原始数据源的情况下也能解决争议。

*最近几天关于[Chainlink的多签钱包安全性](https://twitter.com/ChrisBlec/status/1531377495257366530)推上有比较多的讨论，核心是Link的协议更新由一个多签钱包（4/9）控制，而因为Link和defi众多协议的嵌套，如果这个4/9多签被攻破（或者被政府强制），则可以对整个defi生态带来巨大的破坏。*

我们认为，Link的去中心化程度较弱，和ICP类似，但是采用二层裁决以后，基本上可以保证一层节点没有动机作恶。暂时把Link的去中心化程度和安全等级定位为约等于ICP，因为这两个协议对于每个具体应用的节点数差不多(ICP叫子网、Link叫Don）。

## 三、生态业务及估值分析

Chainlink传统业务：

* *Chainlink喂价：针对一系列资产提供丰富的链上金融市场数据，并为Aave、Synthetix以及dYdX等顶尖DeFi应用保障几十亿美元的价值。这也是Link目前主要的业务*
* *Chainlink VRF：利用链上加密证明机制生成可验证的随机数。比如帮助Aavegotchi铸造具有可验证稀有属性的NFT；为PoolTogether公平地选出无损彩票的中奖者。*
* *Chainlink储备金证明：为智能合约提供链上数据，按需审计通证资产储备，比如TUSD和PAX等稳定币以及跨链通证。*
* *Chainlink外部适配器：为开发者提供工具，接入任何链下数据源或API接口。比如帮助Arbol的农作物参数保险获取天气数据；为Everpedia预测市场的用户获取美国总统大选结果。*

关于收入部分，在官方文档中有一些简单叙述：

> 从 dApp 费用的角度来看，多个 Chainlink 预言机网络现在已经开始盈利。这些是 dApp 为使用 Chainlink 服务而支付的费用。考虑到许多区块链网络继续依赖区块奖励来激励节点性能，仅基于费用的 Chainlink 预言机网络盈利能力是一个独特的里程碑。一些更广泛使用的区块链依赖于[60-70%](https://bitinfocharts.com/comparison/fee_to_reward-btc-eth.html#alltime)的块奖励。

![盈利图表](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8bEgSZSqMIonwmz-f75CB.png?height=1208&width=1871)

由于 Chainlink 的[链下报告协议 (OCR)](https://blog.chain.link/off-chain-reporting-live-on-mainnet/)的效率、Chainlink 预言机网络所运行的区块链的效率提升以及用户需求的增加，某些 Chainlink 预言机网络已经完全盈利并且不需要区块奖励或任何形式的预言机奖励。

随着 dApp 使用更多的 Chainlink 服务，并且构建了新的 dApp 来使用 Chainlink 服务，这创造了一种逻辑动态，其中 dApp 费用流向 Chainlink 预言机节点运营商。

这里提到的“多个”oracle盈利，那么我们假设应该在10-20个左右，而Chainlink现在有670个oracle network，所以整体盈利能力应该还比较差。

在收集资料的过程中，Chainlink的数据可得性比较差劲，比较像一个web 2公司，但我们仍然努力对4个版块进行了搜集：

### 1.Data Feeds

提供链上/链下的oracle，以价格(price) oracle为主，包括BTC, ETH以及各种token的价格信号，以及一些美国股票的报价。

在Github上，搜索 “aggregatorv3interface extension:sol” (ChainLink的data feed的接口) 有37k smart contract文件使用"AggregatorV3Interface"，而"uniswap oracle extension:sol" (包括uniswap v2和v3)有30k smart contract文件。虽然不是一个科学的对比（Chainlink还有新的FeedRegistry接口以及旧的v2），至少从一个侧面反映Chainlink的data feed被普遍应用，成为众多defi dapp的基础设施之一。

虽然应用广泛，但是目前Chainlink所有的data feed都是免费使用，Chainlink目前尚未能从中获取任何收入。

### 2.Verifiable Random Function （VRF）

因为EVM和其他链上面的所有状态都是公开的，理论上链上的状态都是确定性，因此无法产生真正的随机数。

Chainlink为此提供了可验证的随机函数(VRF)供其他smart contract调用。这项服务是收费的，但目前的使用率和费率（2 $LINK/Request），收入相当小。

根据Dune上的数据，VRFCoordinatorV1在Mainnet上5月截止27日止request数为76，收入152 $LINK，当然最高的2月request达到3927（Dune上尚无v2的数据）。BSC和Polygon上的request数比Mainnet高至少几个数量级，5月分别达到6272和341535，但是这两个链上的收费也较低。

我们制作了[Dune Dashboard](https://dune.com/tnkrxyz/Chainlink)统计了Chainlink VRF的使用和收入情况，

![Verifiable Random Function Mainnet使用和收入](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U4ba31jZhD5Fxb_hBemz0.png?height=517&width=951)

### 3.Chainlink Keepers

Chainlink Keepers是一个smart contract自动化工具，允许用户在指定条件下调用smart contract。

每个keeper由两部分组成：设定条件部分（例如指定时间或ETH/USD达到指定价格）由用户的smart contract function定义（这部分运行在chainlink的node上，避免运行在链上的高昂gas费用），第二个部分是链上的contract。当设定条件满足是，chainlink自动调用第二个链上的contract。可以想见keeper对Defi套利科学家、liquidator等相当有用。

keeper同样是收费服务，2021年5月在mainnet发布。在mainnet, BSC, 和polygon上使用和收入情况跟VRF类似：mainnet用户少，五月至目前324个request，收入1071 $LINK，Polygon有7488个request，但收入只有106 $LINK, BSC上2005个request, 收入399 $LINK。

### 4.Any API

Any API是Chainlink还在测试研发尚未正式发布(deploy)的产品。该产品将允许链上contract通过它和任何web2 API交互。

总体而言，就目前Chainlink产品线的收入相对其估值可以忽略不计。不过这几个产品很好的代表了Chainlink善于找到细分领域，执行、做出创新的产品。但VRF，keeper主要服务于defi, web3开发者，相对小众；Data Feeds使用多，目前免费。另一个角度来看，Link是一个立足长远的项目。

目前付给节点的奖励通过LINK支付，30天link reward（给节点）:1,300,326，按照现在的价格($9)，大约是每个月11M USD，每年130M USD的费用

*基于以上，暂时没法做有效的基于收入和利润的估值。目前主要还是叙事驱动。而叙事驱动在熊市里基本无用，在下一轮牛市里也许可以推高估值。*

## 四、LINK2.0新业务方向及叙事

*Link 2.0白皮书中，拓展了多个新功能：*

### 1.链下计算/混合计算

多重去中心化预言机网络”（下文简称DONs）框架，框架中有多个去中心化的预言机网络，并可以实现互操作性。高级链下计算功能让DONs能够为智能合约提供通用门户，并可兼容所有区块链。智能合约不仅能够访问任何链下资源，还能够接入链下计算环境运行代码，弥补区块链在成本、速度、隐私和技术方面的局限性。

因此，Chainlink可以为混合型智能合约提供安全灵活的全栈解决方案，将链上代码与关键的链下计算相结合。这些混合型智能合约将催生出新型去中心化应用，在可扩展性和保密性上都实现重大提升，而这两者都是区块链实现大规模应用的关键要素。

从这里的描述，Link链下计算是一种和layer2有相似点的功能，但和layer 2有两个关键差异：第一link的链下计算安全性不由layer 1保障，而是由link机制保障；第二link的链下计算并不是智能合约，而是传统的计算（如aws上的程序）。

这里澄清一个需求点，如果链下计算仅仅是为了offload链上计算：这个在以太上有众多rollup解决方案，目前看这个应不会是Chainlink主要优势所在。

有一些有意思的可能用例，例如：银行付款（直接连接银行系统）、外部支付（类似外汇）、债券、现实资产、企业数据、保险等。

这种混合计算是Chainlink 的独特优势，因为它本来就已经接了众多数据源。而且混合计算的实用性比较广泛，可以用在很多不同的领域。但目前真实用例还不是很多。也许是因为可以做的太多，而这个范式太新，所以需要比较多的推广。

另外，混合计算也不仅仅是Link的独门绝技，例如ICP、AKT等，直接把云服务搬上区块链，并且和公链体系相连接，也可以实现类似的web 2/ 3的对接。和Link的差异是，ICP/ AKT需要开发新的应用，而Link更像是与已有web 2应用的链接 - 也许更适合大企业。

这里做一个推断，后续Link如果在混合计算这块能有比较多/大的真实用例的话，那么下一轮牛市也许有估值冲高的机会。

### 2.CCIP跨链、多链协议。

CCIP是和一系列跨链桥、跨链交互协议，如anyswap、layer0、Axelar、IBC等竞争的一个协议，主要目的是为了实现跨链的消息交互，进一步实现协议的跨链（例如在matic上调用以太上的uniswap等）。

跨链是22年初比较热的一个话题，因为这个时间多链是相对的市场共识（虽然v神发了文章讲了跨链的安全性问题）。但是随着Luna的衰落，以太 defi的TVL份额回升到60%左右，今天的多链假设实际上受到挑战。

另外，跨链的标准不一，包括前面讲的多家竞品以及新进入的开发中的竞品，跨链这个领域的竞争可以说刚刚起步，所以CCIP是否能取得优势地位，不确定性比较大。

跨链这个领域，Chainlink当前并无突出优势，能否得到市场认可只有边走边看了。

目前CCIP仅看到一个用例：

*[Celsius](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/chainlink-announces-cross-chain-interoperability-protocol-ccip-301349599.html) 是领先的加密货币收益赚取平台，拥有近百万用户和超过 160 亿美元的锁定总价值，将整合 CCIP 以适应未来的平台，并实现跨多链 DeFi 生态系统的收益收获。 Celsius还在 [其后端系统中使用Chainlink Price Feeds](https://celsiusnetwork.medium.com/celsius-secures-backend-pricing-of-crypto-using-the-chainlink-a-major-leap-in-cefi-cd274efdc461) 来确定用户在存入抵押品时的借贷利率，从而帮助平台逐步去中心化。*

### 3.质押功能

Link2.0推出的权益质押功能，是2.0版经济模型的最重要组织部分，在发布之后，LINK也从$5反弹到了$9.2。

其质押围绕四大版块展开：

一是预言机网络进行质押。如果无法履行链上服务水平协议，则将扣除部分代币，这部分主要用于激励节点提供正确的对象，此条主要是为了进一步提升安全性。

二是社区成员和节点运营商等生态参与者，让更多人参与到社区中，同时提升网络去中心化水平，建立更好的机制。

三是鼓励长期质押。一开始主要是发放LINK奖励，之后，会从获得的用户服务费中拔出一部分作为奖励（这一点值得点赞！）

四是通过质押建立声誉系统，节点为自身服务质押多少代币成为一个重要外在指标，更多的质押，意味着更高价值的任务和更大的收入机会。

质押机制并非一步到位，而是逐步进行，2022年下半年将推出第一版，并不断添加新功能。

![官方公布的质押路线图](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eUzg9kcaKK1y5IM0KuRDD.png?height=447&width=843)

## 五、总述

link项目在过去几年里，持续稳步开发，已经成为预言机赛道无可争议的龙头，网络效应较为突出。

项目在过去专注长期价值，在经济模型等各方面发力不多，而新版本质押及跨链等新功能使项目从经济模型和叙事上都有了较大转变，中长期来看，属于较为确定的利好——因为大量的代币将进入质押系统，因此必然发生抛压减少的情况。

但是，由于LINK目前的实际收益极少，我们仍然强调，代币质押带来的中短期​市场供应的变化之后，仍然暂时是靠叙事驱动。应长期关注后续跨链协议及项目​营收等各方面情况。​

title: Day 12: Redeem your skills on RabbitHole and build a web3 resume
body:
> **CORE CONCEPTS**
>
> *We’ve already introduced [the concept of composability](https://mirror.xyz/cerv1.eth/s1UwRJxhTi76PdFlS6hqN8kHqe9oVImbGlTtzE_IHFQ) -- that is, the power to use open data and source code to build new applications on top of existing ones. The same features that make it easy to follow a user’s activity on the blockchain make it possible to verify one’s knowledge or mastery of a topic. Today, we’ll try out one of the first applications that capitalizes on the ability to view a user’s on-chain skills progression: RabbitHole.*

### The traditional resume vs the on-chain resume

A resume is a document that provides an overview of your professional qualifications, including relevant work experience, skills, education, and accomplishments. Many professionals spend hours formatting and word-smithing their resumes.

A traditional resume is a heavily curated, one-page synthesis of all the experiences and skills you feel are most relevant and attractive to an employer. Although few employers crosscheck the truthfulness of what’s on your resume, there’s an implicit honor code that anything you put on it should be verifiable.

The idea of an “on-chain resume” is nascent but stands to eliminate much of the curation and verification challenge. You can prove that you attended certain learning events through your POAPs. You can demonstrate that you are capable of performing certain tasks by sharing your transaction history. You can back up your claim to be an active member of a DAO via your voting records on Snapshot. 

These are just a few obvious examples; much more is possible. E. Glen Weyl, Puja Ohlhaver, and Vitalik Buterin recently released [a paper](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=4105763) about non-transferable “soulbound” tokens representing the commitments, credentials, and affiliations of an individual.

Regardless of the mechanism, as more work and social activity start happening on-chain, there will likely be greater value afforded to on-chain credentials.

### What is RabbitHole?

[RabbitHole](https://rabbithole.gg/) is one of the first projects to explore these concepts. From their homepage:

> *We believe web3 fundamentally reshapes the future of work and talent organization. By curating an on-chain graph of a user’s prior achievements, RabbitHole is creating the on-chain resume for the future of work.*

RabbitHole currently has two credentialing tracks for users: Skills and Quests.

1. **Skills**: A Skill is a collection of 3-4 discrete on-chain tasks that you complete to boost your web3 knowledge in a given domain (eg, DAOs). When you “redeem” a skill, RabbitHole verifies your on-chain transaction history.
2. **Quests**: A Quest is a time-bound challenge where you learn how to use a decentralized app, and earn tokens based on your on-chain activity. The proof that you completed a Quest on time is also verified permissionlessly on-chain.

RabbitHole’s Quests are an example of another nascent concept called “learn-to-earn” in which you earn rewards for learning how to use a new product or feature. 

Imagine Google paying you a small amount of money to learn how to use its [Advanced Search](https://www.google.com/advanced_search) commands. Or the knowledge management app Notion giving you a reward for [hosting a page on a custom domain](https://geekflare.com/notion-custom-domain/).

Regardless of whether you want to learn-to-earn or just learn, RabbitHole is a great resource for newcomers to explore different projects and gain exposure to the type of work that is moving on-chain.

In fact, several of your recent actions have already qualified you to redeem Skills on RabbitHole. Let’s check it out.

### Redeeming Skills on RabbitHole

Start by going to the RabbitHole homepage in your MetaMask enabled browser: [rabbithole.gg](https://rabbithole.gg/). Click the button to **Use RabbitHole.**

![The RabbitHole landing page](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7ALUZGFBCoXSRb-MgdmZA.png?height=1486&width=2708)

As usual, you will be prompted to **Connect Your Wallet** and sign the transaction on MetaMask. After doing so, the page should update showing that your wallet is connected.

![Connect to the RabbitHole dapp](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aIhppXpZSQEbjZP6B6z4n.png?height=1514&width=2682)

Sometimes I find the RabbitHole site needs to be refreshed in order to establish a wallet connection. If you don’t see your wallet connected, just refresh your browser and hopefully it will update. If not, try re-connecting.

Once you’re connected, you will see a simple dashboard for Skills and Quests. The Skills page currently includes three credential tracks: NFTs, DeFi, and DAOs. Each skillset includes a tracker of how many on-chain tasks you’ve completed.

Your dashboard should appear similar to the one below -- with a 0/3 or 0/4 tasks displayed for each skillset. 

We’ll start by scrolling down to **Intro to DAOs** and clicking that button.

![RabbitHole has various tasks to complete to prove Skills](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MHxqBXkhbwCyv_vJQx09R.png?height=1526&width=2714)

Currently, there are three DAOs Skills available. If you completed the [Day 9 activity](https://mirror.xyz/cerv1.eth/gqdf7YDb6AR-torLOUFPODYMlOD3vMDcDE41xpd0q1E) by voting on Snapshot, then you should be eligible to redeem this task.

If you haven’t voted on Snapshot yet, you can learn more about the process by clicking on the **Details** button or you can click **Start** and go directly to the Snapshot page to see if you are eligible for any current votes. 

If you have voted before, then instead of seeing a “Not Started” indicator, you should see a button prompting you to **Redeem** your skill. \[Unfortunately I don’t have a screenshot of the **Redeem** button turning on.\] If you’ve performed a vote, but don’t see an option to **Redeem**, trying refreshing your browser. 

![Intro to DAOs includes a redemption for voting on Snapshot](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kOlUkK1xpUZtKwMC2LgMH.png?height=1494&width=2668)

After clicking the **Redeem** button, the dashboard updates to show my task is complete. (Again, sometimes you need to refresh the page in your browser to trigger the update.)

![After refreshing, it shows I have completed on DAO task](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KJ6jv0wlFKsKxchJ9JmQu.png?height=1440&width=2616)

Even if you haven’t been able to vote on Snapshot yet, there’s another Skill you should be eligible for if you completed [Day 11](https://mirror.xyz/cerv1.eth/mibs8dYHRL3eWCtxunMNrTkbGa3ZNuy3oE_9bxL_oRg), Staking Ethereum on Lido.

Go back to the all Skills dashboard and click on the **Intro to DeFi** track. It should show that you are eligible to redeem the first of four tasks: Stake ETH on Lido.

Hopefully the redemption works and now you are well on your way to building a basic set of verifiable web3 skills!

![You can also redeem the Stake ETH on Lido task in Intro to Defi](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_WmQdZg69vPrKUJ9IzGFi.png?height=1448&width=2270)

### Final thoughts

RabbitHole is a great learning resource for beginners. If you want to go deeper, you should check their website often or follow their socials to learn about new Skills and especially Quest opportunities. And, because its aimed at beginners, each activity usually has a good write-up and tutorial for how to earn the Skill or complete the Quest. 

I do have a few gripes with RabbitHole, though. First, the website is not super-responsive and doesn’t always capture all the tasks you’ve completed. (The proof is still there, immutably captured on the blockchain; it’s just their backend or integrations with other protocols aren’t updating.)

More importantly, some of the tasks require spending a lot of gas. The remaining DeFi activities in particular are not very friendly for newcomers. We already spent about $12 in gas to Stake ETH. More advanced tasks like lending and borrowing on a DeFi site like [Aave](https://aave.com/) will cost you much more than that. In order to rationalize such gas fees, you’d need to be moving several thousands of dollars worth of ETH per transaction -- something newcomers should probably not be doing. Instead, I think RabbitHole should move its **Intro to DeFi** task redemptions onto another chain like Polygon, where gas fees are much lower and it feels more affordable to experiment with different types of transactions. 

Hopefully, RabbitHole will continue to expand its offerings and make learn-to-earn more accessible to newcomers. 

### Further reading:

[https://rabbithole.mirror.xyz/](https://rabbithole.mirror.xyz/)

[https://collectiveshift.io/tutorial/rabbithole-guide/](https://collectiveshift.io/tutorial/rabbithole-guide/)

title: 好想你
body:
最近一首来自微博名为四叶草的歌《好想你》在网络上蔓延开来。小清新节奏，琅琅上口的旋律，甜美可人的少女，世界各地的完美剪辑，再加上视频最后的表白自述，对这种最没抵抗力了。其实最近都很少刷微博的，但松松给我推荐后就被魔性了。每天就“好想你，好想你，好想你，好想你”刚开始看的时候，“只有有钱人才能玩的了这个”，然后想，今天都30号了，马上跨年了，是不是又该总结人生了呢，于是就“好想你”一下。

好想你。仔细一想，貌似还真木有说过这几个字。我们总是在朋友圈或者聊天里说着“我都想死你了”或者问“想没想我啊”。但这种话，我们说的时候也总会带着玩笑的语气去说或者答。虽然我们也真切地想了，但总感觉这些话一说出来，味就不对了。是的，我们总是这样。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ChTZxhJYSjBknM9UyMfzs.png?height=253&width=393)

坐在床上，插上耳机，打开音乐，听着自动播放的歌曲，打开电脑，看着自己仅仅写了个开头便没有头绪的小说，想着要把自己和朋友们都写进去。我终于明白平凡中少平在医院躺着写不出头绪的感觉了。何其相似。然后决定去耍点别的，看到各种跨年的资讯，就想，想想这一年吧，就突然间觉得，从几个月前离开学校，跟好多人就没有见面了，有的也挺想的，但也总不会去说那句“我想你了。”

身边的一个小孩说“我现在特别不乐意回家，感觉没意思，那么大点各地，特无聊，还总被唠叨”“等你再过两年，你就会想回家了”我这么说着，他，那么听着。

我一直觉得“想”这个字是最美好的。 那是思念，是追忆，是想守护，是想被爱。他的表达形式有很多。你爹可能会用训斥来表达;你妈可能会用唠叨来表达;兄弟之间可能会用一句“CNM”来表达，姐妹之间可能会用搂搂抱抱来表达;非恋人男女朋友之间可能会用一段调侃来表达;恋人之间可能会用一个亲吻来表达;跟前任之间可能用一阵沉默来表达。但无论怎样的表达，那都是真实的“我想你了!”

一说到“想”，第一个想的一定是分别。毕业季，毕业祭。想起之前写过的大学分别，再想起高中分别。“仪式”这种东西还真是够有力的。想起之前看《老炮儿》，六爷那最后的退场的仪式感，还真是令人感伤啊。记得在老炮儿的评论下看到一条影评“他让我想起我爹了”。如果说好电影是什么样的，我觉得这就算一个样。

有点跑题了哈，言归正传。想着想着，我失恋都有一年的时间的了，真是太惨了太惨了。爱情对我这样的人来说，真是可遇不可求啊。就像珊珊说的“我是找不到对象了，可咋办啊。”那么真挚地每天思念一个人是什么感觉，我想我是说不明白的。但我记性还是蛮好的，想着该记住的人，记住和朋友们的每次欢聚。我想着这也是“想你了”吧

2015年初，同学结婚，我和磊哥却醉的死死的;寒假期间和海哥，海瑞，鼻子我们相聚了几次;跟爽小姐去南湖滑了个冰，虽然她欠我一顿饭还没还呢;陪彤妹去给阿呆小姐拍照片，我也给她拍了两张，虽然被pass了;跟松哥和武，宗相聚，不远万里去接我欢姐，却把我伟儿弄丢了;15在学校过的，煮的元宵，喝的痛快;在校期间跟山东去爬的泰山，只身去的北戴河，遇见了许小姐了，算是邂逅，开始读书，写字;暑假考完了驾照，期间见了珊珊两面;跟辰去参加她同学的婚礼;跟老三去的呼伦贝尔;回学校，实习，分别;9月，长春，跟王晶和她家马先生小聚;十月份8天，连休5天，2天在路上，在家待3天，回来连上了10几天班，只为在家里多待一秒;松松，路遥，磊哥一场麻辣盛宴，没坏肚子已是万幸;去珊珊哪里拿礼物;去松松学校拿书;去警察学院看我京姐在女汉子的路上慢慢前行;许多想见已经见到了的人，许多想见还没有见到的人。思念，确实是一种很玄很玄的东西。

今年是惨烈的，因为相聚是美好的，没时间是罪恶的。

好想你，好想你，好想你，好想你，有够力够力好想你，真的西北西北好想你。

你想谁了吗?

title: 我想许个愿望
body:
我想许个愿望，在2015年的最后一天里。

岚宝-我希望2016年的你能遇上那个能让你幸福的人。我希望能有一段更合适你的爱情，去粉饰你那颗装满玻璃的心。

那一年元旦节的一盒费列罗，让巧克力成为了我以后每个元旦节对你的纪念品。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/fTkG2SoWOnwqdUsmv--SV.png?height=280&width=422)

凌晨街道总是会更容易让人心生感慨，或好或坏。节日的来临，似乎总能让孤单无限放大，外面相拥而走的人群，总是在无意间嘲讽你的形影单只。广州的冬天相比长沙，确实算不上冷，而今年的我，却似乎比往年更容易怕冷。总是会在稍微降一点温的时候就穿上羽绒服，带上围巾。很久，都不曾出门的时候身边有一个可以挽着一起走得人，许久，电话渐渐的越来越难以响起，偶尔看到一两个未接电话，心里会遐想或许是谁记挂起我，而真相往往在点开手机的那一刹那，抹杀了之前那一刻所有的憧憬。人越长大，似乎就变得更远。曾经要好的朋友，总是在时间，空间的阻隔下日渐模糊了视线。想起要去联系他们的时候，却会因为间隔久远的语塞而不知如何开口。明明记得那时候我们是无话不聊的啊，可是如今已是变得无话可聊。言语上看上去只是变了一个字，而我们的世界却已经经历了一场物事沧桑。

在今年年末的时候，总是更容易想起你。一年过去了，我们出现在彼此生命里的时间又多了一年。从2008年-2016年。中间的七年仿佛觉得刹那间就过去，而今的我们，好像并不再延续着那七年累积的感情。一直都记得那我们好像昨天还是两个围绕着高中校园跑步的小姑娘，可是回归现实里，你我已经形同陌路了。曾经我以为我们的感情能够战胜一切矛盾与隔阂，竟不知越深厚的感情就有越多在乎的细枝末节。

以后的元旦节，会再也没有你吗?

今晚，很想你。

title: 那个明媚的少女
body:
室外的天，我一转头就可以看得到，那是一种似雾霾般的颜色。我突然想起了那明媚的少女，那温暖了我学生时代的挚友。是她，在无数个如今天一般的日子里，伴我走过。我觉得，我们是命中注定的相遇，而你将会是我一生的伙伴。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/16zqhSzLKwxndUMbUJBsk.png?height=211&width=365)

有时候，不得不承认，确实存在命中注定的缘分。那是个阳光明媚的中午，我与好友在校园里漫步，操场上的人很多，大多我都不认识，不经意的向那边扫了一眼，一眼便看到了她。那时的她一手插着腰，一手拿着沙包，毫不掩饰的大笑，一口大白牙衬着那健康的肤色，高挑但略带清瘦的身影，不知能爆发出多少能量，把沙包狠狠的甩出，命中了。我看见，那笑，那么好看，一下子点亮了我的眼。

静静的在那伫立了几分钟，随口问了一句，那是谁啊。本不以为会得到答案，没想到好友竟然认识，当即侃侃而谈。原来她还算得上是个风云人物，比我们低一届，成绩经常处在年级前三，第一的情况也很多，脾气很好，人缘极好，再加上爱玩，与那些孩子们都打成一片，就连老师也过分喜爱这个有活力的女孩。我那时觉得她就是那被上帝宠爱着的女孩。

不久便知道了她的名字，若男，若男。我们的计算机课，需要用到下一年级的课本，好友门路多，拉着我便去了她们教室门口。不多时送来了两本书，我翻开其中一本，上面那三个飘逸帅气的文字，便那样入了我的眼。只此一眼，我便记住了，至此从未忘过;只此一眼，我脑海中便不自觉浮现出那个身影;只此一眼，我知道了，她的名字。

真正有交集的日子，不同于那天的明媚，那是我最失意的时候。中考失利，回到母校复读，因招的复读生数量不足以达到开班的程度，我便作为插班生走进了他所在的班级。那时他们还在上课，没有多余的桌子，作为外来者的我狼狈的站在教室后。这情况本不至于让人如此狼狈，偏偏在我前方坐着的，是我很早便认识的一个帅气男孩，他酷酷的在前面睡着，一睁眼便发现了狼狈的我，吓得我赶紧移开了相交的视线，慌乱中，我看到了她。于是，我笑了，那时我便知道，接下来的日子定不会寂寞。

我就这样走进了她的生活，相知，相识，却也让我真正知道了她，故乡在河南的她，跟着父母从小就来到了这个她陌生的地方，异乡生活的她，多亏了有很多小伙伴陪着她，生活过得很快乐。知道了这些之后，我愈发喜欢着她，她阳光，她坚强，我享受着她带给我的阳光与快乐。那时的我们很快乐，有很多很多好朋友陪着我，复读的日子并不乏味。我们一起走进了高中，同是一个班，无形中距离又拉近了许多，我们一起去吃小吃，一起迟到，一起被罚站，一起逛街，一起回家。市区里几乎都有我们留下的大大小小的足迹。

可是好景不长，高二分班，我们被分到了虽然只有一墙之隔的不同教室，但联系却明显不如之前那么频繁，但有时间也在一起玩耍。那时的我，收起了许多坏习惯，上课便认真听课，下课老老实实做作业，只偶尔会在夜晚挑灯夜读，看的是一个朋友喜欢收藏的《爱格》系列的小说。和她的联系都在吃饭时间，平时也多是我率性而为，她配合着我时间。在我难过的时候过来陪我，听我抱怨，在我高兴的时候陪我一起乐。细细想来，我为她做的却少之又少，而她总是脾气很好的包容着任性的我。

放假时，总是会去她家叨扰一番，叔叔阿姨也如闺女一般待我。有她在的日子里，我的生活充满了阳光，永远不会感到孤单，一直觉得会这样一直走下去。没想到，分别的日子，那么快就来了。就在离高考只剩两三个月的时候，她不得不离开，去户口所在地参加高考。虽然早就知道了，但总以为不过就是几个月，去了就还会再回来，所以难过也只是一刹那，考完了会再见的，我一直这样安慰自己。

日子一天天的逼近，终于无可避免的来了。我和她的朋友们提前吃了她的送别餐，收拾好了行装，到了离开的那天，我被朋友拉着去送别，没心没肺的送走了她，无所谓的转身继续学习，。我若无其事的在校园里走着，到处找寻着她的痕迹，但却什么都没找到，与她有关的一切都已消失不见，那么干净。那时才更加真切的意识到，失去了她。脑海里闪过她对我说的话，回去了之后不一定还回不回来，父母也会跟着回去。阵阵失落感迎面扑来，不知是什么东西吹进了我的眼，让我看不清那路，让我再也找不到那明媚的少女。

那时的我忘了，有一种聊天工具叫做QQ;我忘了，有一种通讯工具，叫做手机;我忘了，只要可以联系，终有再见的一天。所幸，我忘了，她没忘。

再次联系上已是各自去了各自的学校，有了自己的手机之后。那会知道了，那个明媚的少女依在。认识她七年有余，重新联系上后，她又继续，给我传递满满的正能量。如今的我们有了新的生活目标，将来的将来，我们要到同一个城市，一起打拼，一起生活。我正为此而努力学习，等到找到工作后，再相聚。

到如今我们快三年没见面，但我相信，再见的那一天，不会太远。到那时，定要为她遮风挡雨，撑起一片天，让她可以肆无忌惮的笑，永远做那个明媚的少女。那时我们住在我们的家里，我们的小天地里，打打闹闹。那情景，只是想想，便令我嘴角含笑，不能自拔。

title: 老友依旧
body:
时光飞逝，一切都在变，唯有老友依旧。

他们沉淀在岁月的流里，也沉淀在我们的心里，任时光老去，他们依旧年轻。

元旦节前夕，高中好友猴子发微信告诉我，元旦节来找我玩。从高中毕业，我们已经四年没见过面了，虽然我们各自读大学的城市并不算是太远，但我们终究还是没有去对方的城市一聚，因为我们总是被各种杂乱的事情牵绊着，不能洒脱的走一遭。我们也很少打电话，只是逢年过节的时候，才抽得出时间，找得到理由与彼此聊聊天。

这些天，我对我们所预约的时光充满期待，但是很遗憾，今天她发来图片，告诉我，公司加班，只能以后再约，我有些沮丧，但不得不理解已经加入上班族的她。她也被生活所困，而我，也快了。

下午，和高中的另外一名好友聊了QQ，高中毕业后，她去了上海，我留在了四川，也是三年未见面了。我们聊了许多往事，仿佛又回到了从前。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NbnJC_s1fuzjMlqNoGwu4.png?height=295&width=502)

突然发现以前的日子，我们都过得好奢侈，每天呆在一起，吵嘴甚至还打起来。却从没想到，重逢是难上加难。

我给猴子回了消息：你上班吧，有时间咱再聚吧!

我知道，人长大了，很多事都是身不由己，我们能记住彼此是老友，足矣。时光会老，老友依旧。

title: 独立変数と従属変数（2022.06.09)
body:
大学生の頃、今から4年前ですが、8年生の終盤は真面目に授業を受けていました。ほぼ単位がA+しかなかったんじゃないかな。まあそれにしても8年は、大学に通いすぎですよね。

まあ、それはさておき。大学8年の頃は、幻冬舎で「あたらしい経済」を立ち上げ、運営し始めていたので、ちょうど働く楽しさをわかってきた時期なんです。そして働き始めると、自分の好奇心がどんどんと強くなっていき、学ぶことが楽しくて仕方なくなりました。それは今でも、変わらないのですが。

ちなみに僕は心理学（認知行動療法）のゼミに属していて、けっこう数学的な知識を使ってました。そしてその時に知ったのが「独立変数」と「従属変数」です。「独立変数」は、y= f(x)のxで、「従属変数」はyです。つまりxに従って、yの数値が変わるのです。

なぜかぼくは、それらを知った時から「まず自分だけでなんとかなることに集中し努力しよう」ということを意識し始めました。たぶんそれは「x」のことでしょう。「y」は外的環境に左右されがちで好ましくないのです。

例えば、「マクロ経済」や「他の家族」や「仕事仲間」などです。もちろん究極的に言えば「仕事仲間」は、自分でなんとかできる節もあると思いますが、みんなそれぞれの生き方や働き方があり、ある程度は、自由な方が良いに決まっています。

そう、何が言いたいかというと。僕は、まずは自分ができる範囲で自由にやれることに集中したいんです。周りに、人間関係で悩んでいたり、する人がいて「助けたいな」と思うと、いつも「独立変数」と「従属変数」の話をしています。

参考になるかは分かりませんが、共有してみました。

title: 連阿公、阿嬤都能輕易上手的鏈遊-Stepn
body:
你有聽過跑步可以賺錢嗎？沒錯，Stepn讓它成真了。曾何幾時，跑步賺的錢已經超過一般在超商、外送人員的薪水。這種新的 X to Earn的模式，也讓人們發現在Web3.0時代，萬勿皆可以變現。

> 近半年來，Stepn是Web3.0最受關注的GameFi之一，跑步賺錢的模式讓人相擁而入。玩家需要透過買跑鞋NFT，透過跑步得到遊戲代幣，最後可以換成美金穩定幣提領。

本篇不討論遊戲經濟，或是如何靠遊戲賺錢，而是以使用者角度切入，為何Stepn可以拉入幣圈跟非幣圈的玩家入場。

`(1)App介面`
簡潔的App見面，讓即使不懂英文的玩家，也可以直覺遊玩。Home頁面，只有一個Start開始鍵，讓玩家只要按下就可以開始。

![Stepn App介面](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1m76kYgmm2iYW4fnJ90lq.png?height=656&width=1222)

`(2)錢包`
這是最令人驚艷的地方，大部分項目都要外部個人錢包連接遊戲，而Stepn做到了把錢包嵌在遊戲App裡面，大大減少入門的門檻。玩家可以輕易地在App裡面創建個人錢包(如圖中Wallet)，可以跟遊戲內錢包的互相轉帳。另外，外部個人錢包還可以做到各種幣別的換匯，玩家可以很容易地把遊戲幣換回美金穩定幣(如圖中Swap)。

`(3)NFT交易市場`
玩過NFT的玩家都知道，要去如Opensea二級市場做買賣，但是Stepn聰明的把市場(如圖中Marketplace)留在App裏面，光是手續費，就賺到了大部分收入。

總結來說，Stepn是目前GameFi中最平易近人的鏈遊，它吸引了許多非幣圈的玩家，這點是非常難人可貴的。

![A](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/8VNgucnko2leMCluSLtpk.jpg?height=2880&width=3840)

**Analysis purpose**

After participating in many blockchain games in the market, I found that most of them are so-called "mining games", which only have the speculative attributes of drumming and passing flowers, and there is no real in-depth game experience.

Eternal World is the first 3A Xianxia metaverse game I found in the world. Since many capitals are laying out the chain game track, I will use the whole article to analyze Eternal World to see if it can be grasped in 2022, a hundredfold return, and open dual channels of entertainment and wealth

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qvaPe6KAoVx8SQKXmk812.jpg?height=1158&width=1697)

Before that, sprite also read a lot of bloggers' interpretations of web2 and web3 games. Many people will take the well-known King Glory as an example. King Glory players belong to consumption and pay to Tencent, but the money cannot be returned. In the eyes of people in the currency circle, there is no gold farming effect. But why does the King Glory live so well? The answer given by many bloggers is that it is fun and can bring spiritual enjoyment to people. I agree with this.

Next, these bloggers continued to give examples. If there is a 100% nano-replica web3 version of the King Glory, the gameplay is exactly the same as the glory of the king of web2, then now you spend 1,000 RMB to buy the skin, the skin first belongs to you, and then you can also slowly get pay back while playing. Most of this money is not given to Tencent, but is taken from players and used for players. So which would you choose?

The conclusion given by the bloggers is that everyone will prefer the Glory of the King of web3

But sprite don’t think so. At first glance, there is nothing wrong with it, but if you think about it carefully, you will find that there are many paradoxes in it.

I think it's more like a plate. People put money in first, and then get it back little by little over time. Even after getting the principal back, you can get more profits.

Isn't this the obvious plate play? The predecessors make money from the later players. Is this the so-called take from the players and use it for the players? Why don't the predecessors build the bridge, and the latter pay the bill?

I think everyone once defined the web3 game, don't forget the success of web2, there is its inevitability, we should not completely ignore the properties of web2 while thinking about web3

So what do I think a successful web3 game should look like?

There must be levels, and there must be big brothers! The big brother is the main consumer in the game. The charge money strength of the big brother in traditional games is beyond people's imagination. It does not mean that the big brother is a fat sheep, and the investment cannot be recovered. It's the big brother in the game, who usually buys time, efficiency, and sense of achievement with money.

They don't plan carefully, and how to operate will return the money faster. For the big brother in the game, they enjoy the pleasure of paying for the bill. The same time invested in the game to calculate the income, it is better to put it into their business and there will be a faster return. So big brother is here to buy pleasure with money

Last year, many chain games targeted those bosses and asked them to invest millions and tens of millions, claiming that they would pay back their money in a few days. That is pure nonsense. Will the real rich believe it? As a result, it collapsed, and some big brothers made money. Whose money did they make?

A big brother of who has millions of money may cut hundreds of ordinary players, or it may be another big brother. So we must return to human nature. The real big brother's position in the game is the consumer, and this is not the battlefield for them to make money. They come to the game to spend money to save time, improve efficiency and get pleasure! Don't listen to that nonsense that the more you invest, the more you get paid.

So why is there less and less big brother in web2 games now? Is the big brother unwilling to play games, or is the big brother old and no energy to play?

Actually no, games are an excellent field of spiritual pastime for modern people. With the opening of powerful social attributes, games have no age span. They are not children's play as we understand them. They have become the entry of major international capital running the track.

So does it mean that the current economic environment is poor, and the big brothers have no money? In fact, believe that sentence, the rich may have no money one day, but there will never be a shortage of rich people in this world. In fact, the real reason why the big brother is reluctant to continue playing the game is actually that he has less companionship. Big brother himself is in the game, there is no social interaction, no competition, no sense of honor, and naturally no desire to consume. Why is this?

Because a really fun game is often heavily involved, like the legends of web2, Paradise, and World of Warcraft in the past. Everyone needs to be immersed in games for a long time, but with the increasing pressure of life and the rapid development of the Internet era, in addition to games, other entertainment and pastimes have been born. For example, live broadcast is the most typical example. Now many people choose to watch live broadcast for spiritual entertainment in their free time. It may be easier to lie down and get pleasure than playing games.

So having said that, do we have a little inspiration? Why do games urgently switch from web2 to web3? Did the game project party Conscience discover it? Give back tens of millions of dollars in revenue to players every year?

NONONO, the cake of capital will not be easily cut out, they are more vicious than we imagined. The reason why we anxiously switch to WEB3 is because traditional web2 games cannot survive! The reason is that there is no accompany to play, anyway, they are not making money, there are too many channels for entertainment, no one wants to immerse in the game to get the pleasure.

So how do you get the player back into the game, money! Let's make money! Money is omnipotent, and money is the biggest driving force of people. Only by allowing us to truly earn money while playing games is the real web3 game.

In fact, here, everyone also understands that we ordinary people have a hidden identity in web3 games, that is, the accompany of the big brother. We play with it more, activate social interaction, increase game competition, and create a complete ecology with strong interaction and competition system, so that the big brother is naturally willing to consume. Taking the scene of the live broadcast room as an example, what kind of live broadcast room has a big brother spending, often with a large audience and a lot of interaction, whether you brush gifts or not, there are always people chatting and interacting with rhythm on the public screen, which will naturally attract big brothers to brush the list.

The open gang function of the game is a very good social means. The competition between gangs and gangs is accompanied by promotion of physique within the gang, allowing more ordinary players to form a group to make money. At the same time, I don't worry about the big brothers holding a group. It sounds ugly. Only the poor talk about holding a group. The rich are all competitive.

Just like in the live broadcast room, those spectators with a low wealth level are the easiest to form a group. Everyone also doesn’t buy gifts, and no one looks down on anyone. Let’s find a way to let the anchor give everyone more benefits, and stimulate the big brother to go to the anchor’s consumption. Reward, this virtually completes a closed loop. The anchor sings and dances to benefit ordinary players, and ordinary players tout the big brother and stimulate the big brother to spend on the anchor.

Who says we don’t invest without spending money? Our time and energy are all invested, and it is also about the cost of being a foil! When an anchor has information, there are players watching, such a live broadcast room will naturally attract big brothers

Therefore, in web3 games, the core is the game, and the target of the game is the anchor of the live broadcast room! Whether it is fun or not, and whether the design is reasonable or not, is the key to whether it can attract players.

We ordinary players are optimistic that your game is fun, and I believe that there will be more big brothers to consume, so we play it, so that we can make money.

So a good WEB3 game, I think it should have the following points

**Token Model
ETL allocation rules**

NFT pledged mining output 15% (released in 12 months): 150 million

Market liquidity 2%: 20 million

Institutional investment 8%: 80 million

TGE price: 0.02U

Deflation mechanism: 85% of the ETL recharged in the game is destroyed, and 15% is injected into the development fund

**Economic Cycle Model**

Get spirit stones by participating in game activities Use Spirit Stones to auction black gold in-game Black gold can be exchanged for ETL at a ratio of 1:1

You can buy spirit stones by recharging ETL in the game

Such a complete economic cycle model, coupled with the ultimate deflation mechanism. It really avoided the death spiral of the so-called "digging, selling" of chain games.(The white book also introduces more detailed gameplay of Genesis NFT)

**NFT proportional distribution:：**

NFT is the inheritance of the immortals of Eternal world. It is a creation token and can be pledged for mining.The total number of NFTs issued is 300,000, and the team retains 20%

Synthesis requires 2 NFTs of the same level to synthesize, and the synthesis rate of different levels is different. A failure to synthesize destroys an NFT, which creates a massive deflation. The higher the level of NFT, the lower the probability of synthesis, but at the same time the benefits will be super amplified

In addition to obtaining pledge tokens, level 5 NFTs also have exclusive monster spawning maps in the game scene. I think this gameplay is very novel and user-friendly. It has both the randomness of NFT blind box opening and the multi-functional properties of synthesis.

Players who have been drawn to Level 1 and Level 2 NFTs in this way, if they do not want to enter the game to play, can also synthesize Level 3 NFTs to pledge and mine tokens. The highest-level 5-level NFT can only be obtained through synthesis, which will keep the floor price of low-level NFTs rising.

The selling price of the blind box is only 10U, allowing more players to lower the threshold to participate. At the same time, the number of Level 5 NFTs is limited. When Level 5 NFTs have been synthesized and saturated, players can only buy from each other in the secondary market.

And the following krypton gold game players, if they want to enter the exclusive map PK to compete for equipment, can only buy it from the holders who have NFT in the early stage. Buy. This truly enables traditional game players to learn blockchain operations, and also makes NFTs in the hands of players in the blockchain more valuable support. This kind of equity NFT is really valuable

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VPWHGx8Hxsn-I97LVy4JA.jpg?height=1158&width=1697)

Sprite really believes that such NFTs are worth participating in and owning, whether from the perspective of hype value-added or long-term holding and enjoying rights. The real fighting speed, fighting luck, fighting strength

In the end, the game is a good game. Creating the world's first 3A masterpiece with the theme of Xianxia is a style that has swept the world this year, especially the unique preference of foreign players. Sophisticated production and a strong project team is a large-scale chain game that is worth looking forward to this year. NFT is also highly recommended to participate. The project party does not keep tokens for itself. The choice to hold NFT to launch together is to make the game well for a long time. NFT has a very large room for value-added, whether it is pledged to obtain tokens, or the secondary market. Transactions are high-quality projects that can be full of high returns and must not be missed!

title: Casual but Meaningful: an Interview with CFW
body:
As mint date draws inexorably nearer, I decided it was a good time to do a quick and **casual artist insight interview** on Discord. There are a few things about CFW’s creative process and mind that I have come to respect immensely, and wanted to share his own words with you all.

Our conversations with CFW are always so productive, and oftentimes fu\*king absurd. We end up laughing like complete idiots about ridiculous things, from weird Discord emotes and stickers, to art we find on and off web3. As always, this started out casual, and as always, I made it get weird and deep. We still ended up on degen humor somehow (wtf is wrong with us).

Discord emotes unfortunately will not be visible in this format, so they have been removed. Feel free to picture a bunch of animated, weird, colorful, somewhat derpy blobs and smileys and :kek: all over the place.

![GM from Orbgasm](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dykkRToMfl9Daquj_IfKv.png?height=1500&width=1500)

`ORB`: what's up! what are you working on?

`CFW`: lol, sup! at this exact moment, working on a 1/1 for the collection.

`ORB`: oh shiiiii-

this has been a wild ride. let’s get into this interview bsns. where did it start for you with the Stacyverse?

`CFW`: it really has, and I feel like I haven't stopped to really take in how far we've come with the Stacyverse. I was asked this question earlier as well, because I think people see a very cohesive narrative over the past few collections but truth be told it's been a brick by brick kinda of a thing where I just began doing my thing with the pills, and then more people came, more artist collaborations were made, a team was built, and we gave life to the entire collection through stories that brought together all the parts into what we now call the '**Stacyverse**'

![Ginseng Matte](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kHvIaXqp5QwOq4GOoWtya.jpg?height=2832&width=2832)

`ORB`: it really is kind of crazy-feeling when we realize how deep in our art we get sometimes. i think one of the coolest things about art is when you are enjoying the process of creating, and not just looking at the final product. do you often find yourself immersed fully in **Cinema4D** and losing track of time? i imagine you also run into complications you have to troubleshoot, which is part of the process. what do the good bursts of creative flow look like for you? what do the frustrating ones look like?

`CFW`: such a good question.  yes, I think this past year has been really an eye opener for me, because NFTs made me think about art more seriously. I've been using these 'professional' tools for my motion design job and making 'art,' but it's only after NFTs and making new friends in the commune that I truly understand that definition of **art**, and the **beauty** that lies in it.

and yes, when it comes to creating, most of the time  I’m fully immersed in what I do, and I think it's crucial to bring to fruition anything you've set out to do, or else you will not be able to see it finished, or not in the form you envisioned it to be. my hack to not having 'frustrating' creative work flow is put a break on working itself. deliberately taking time off is a way I make sure the times I do work are a good experience for me & what I make.

also, snek pek!

![SNEAKY RARE WIP PEEKS !@#](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xwm5hI4GvhXdu4VqsLIyU.png?height=1240&width=1270)

(still a wip though, I wanted something more joyous when compared to the other eerie parts of the project)

`ORB`: holy shit.

this uplifting (and rare) ultra-positive Pillhead you are working on echoes this sentiment so much; escaping frustration not just by taking a break, but also being able to create with a focus on beauty and positivity. working with you, i have come to realize that at your core ethos and methodology , you are constantly working to bring a message of positivity with your work. where does this come from? is it partially a cultural thing? is there an experience you can pinpoint in your life that solidified this as a core part of your paradigm as an artist?

(lol, casual just got heavy. i suck at light interviews lol)

`CFW`: huh, you're making me spill stuff. haha!

I don't think it's a cultural thing. rather, I think it stems from my personal growth as a human first before anything else. we all grow up in a very institutionalized environment, in the assumption that everything we see around us is safe, non-destructive. but I spent my early 20s traveling across my country, India; and the more I saw, the more unhappy the world seemed. not everyone is born with a silver spoon and life gets tough. I lost my dad to cancer, and some of my friends to depression. the world can get ugly real quick. but if there's anything that I can do to make it a little better, I think it's my attempt to create art that shares a positive message. I've always said this - the pill is in everything I do, and it isn't really about narcotics, but rather the idea that it provides a sense of feeling safe through chemically induced spaces you can go to. I think I still have a long way to go to truly **spread happiness** through my art.

(yep, it got dark)

![Hello I am actually CFW](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mIT7FWEJZoKkUyQXOFTeG.png?height=1500&width=1500)

`ORB`: this is intense, and beautiful. thank you for sharing that personal piece.

i am no stranger to death, and i think it makes for the strongest impressions that drive folks to do better in their lifetimes. it's a long road that sometimes seems short. our vision [\[article linked here\]](https://mirror.xyz/pillheads.eth/IZsahGgxbj-myq1-w-XiTnefAMybyLewT9L0LQoKsWE) shows what a long way we have to go though! are you excited to start working with mediums outside of 3D for this project? will this be like leaving a comfort zone for you?

[https://mirror.xyz/pillheads.eth/IZsahGgxbj-myq1-w-XiTnefAMybyLewT9L0LQoKsWE](https://mirror.xyz/pillheads.eth/IZsahGgxbj-myq1-w-XiTnefAMybyLewT9L0LQoKsWE)

`CFW`: of course! 

I really want to spend the next couple of months, maybe **years** trying to see where we can take this shared effort of 'Pillheads' because when I started Stacy Pills, it started with me, but Pillheads isn't just me: it is the result is a beautiful collaboration between 5 brilliant minds, and soon a community of thousands! I think there's a real potential to turn this brand into a household name.

`ORB`: i'm so excited and terrified at the same time, realizing what we've been creating. it comes back to sometimes having to raise our head up and look at where we are in this sea of insanity we have worked ourselves into. sounds like drowning, but really i think this is called feeling truly alive. to quote Louis Carroll, **"we're all crazy here."**
it means so much to be able to share these quick but deep insights into your mind CFW. is there a message you would like to leave folks reading this with?

`CFW`: hmm....

WGMI?

lol nah...

NFTs are dead?

jokes aside, what we're building is a slow & delicate process. as a holder, you witness first hand, a beautiful community in the making that doesn't stem from 'profits' but from **Art**. we truly want to attract people that think like us, to help create a space that feels like home. we know all of us at the end of the day are here to make money, but the way we make it, and our intentions in the space will truly determine what web3 looks like years from now.

**take the pill & let's see where this trip takes us!**

![vibin' with unkfunk](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Lo9GijmHGx0DwtHmhVqek.png?height=1500&width=1500)

Hope you all enjoyed this short but sweet interview. For more insight on the art and process, feel free to hop on the [Pillheads™ Discord](https://discord.gg/pillheads) and get engaged! 

See you on the 16th! 

\-Orb


---

>

>
